berita: Alarmed by rumors that the Pokemon video game has elements of Jewish religion and culture, a Muslim asks a rabbi from Jerusalem to find out. According to Ben Abrahamson, founder of the Al Sadiqin Organization, a center for the study of Islamic and Jewish history, Pokemon has no meaning in Jewish culture. "It has no meaning in our culture," explained Ben on his personal Facebook page. "It comes from Japan and comes from Japanese video game culture, most of its symbols and writing appear in Japanese animation." However, Ben admits that there are also many people who don't like Pokemon. "A lot of people don't like it because it's a waste of time, it's selfish, and it makes one go wild astray on the internet," he replied, when told that Pokemon caused a lot of trouble among Muslims. In the comment section, Ben also quoted verse 6, Surah Al-Hujurat from the Quran to answer the rumors posted on the internet. The verse advises Muslims to research any news to determine its truth so that undesirable things do not befall a race and lead to regret. According to his website, Ben and Al Sadiqin find and explain the common heritage of Islam and Judaism, and reject the notion that the two religions have been enemies since time immemorial. For years, the rumor that Pokemon is a Jewish invention and has religious elements has been spread to Muslims through social media and the internet. According to the baseless accusation, "Pokemon" means "I am Jewish" in Syriac, while the creature's names "Pikachu" and "Charmander" mean "be a Jew", and "God is weak". "Pokemon" is published by the Nintendo company, and its name is an abbreviation of the word "Pocket Monsters", referring to the 722 cute creatures that players collect in the video game. Recently, Perak Mufti Tan Sri Harussani Zakaria has suggested that Malaysia ban the "augmented reality" game application Pokemon Go because it is considered gambling. Pahang Mufti Datuk Seri Abdul Rahman Osman also thinks it should be banned if it is proven to contain elements of gambling.
berita_id: Khawatir oleh desas -desus bahwa video game Pokemon memiliki unsur -unsur agama dan budaya Yahudi, seorang Muslim meminta seorang rabi dari Yerusalem untuk mengetahuinya.Menurut Ben Abrahamson, pendiri Organisasi Al Sadiqin, sebuah pusat studi tentang sejarah Islam dan Yahudi, Pokemon tidak memiliki arti dalam budaya Yahudi."Tidak ada arti dalam budaya kita," jelas Ben di halaman Facebook pribadinya."Itu berasal dari Jepang dan berasal dari budaya video game Jepang, sebagian besar simbol dan tulisannya muncul dalam animasi Jepang."Namun, Ben mengakui bahwa ada juga banyak orang yang tidak suka Pokemon."Banyak orang tidak menyukainya karena buang -buang waktu, itu egois, dan itu membuat seseorang tersesat liar di internet," jawabnya, ketika diberitahu bahwa Pokemon menyebabkan banyak masalah di kalangan Muslim.Di bagian komentar, Ben juga mengutip ayat 6, Surah al-Hujurat dari Al-Quran untuk menjawab rumor yang diposting di internet.Ayat ini menyarankan umat Islam untuk meneliti berita apa pun untuk menentukan kebenarannya sehingga hal -hal yang tidak diinginkan tidak menimpa perlombaan dan mengarah pada penyesalan.Menurut situs webnya, Ben dan Al Sadiqin menemukan dan menjelaskan warisan umum Islam dan Yudaisme, dan menolak anggapan bahwa kedua agama telah menjadi musuh sejak dahulu kala.Selama bertahun -tahun, desas -desus bahwa Pokemon adalah penemuan Yahudi dan memiliki unsur -unsur agama telah menyebar ke Muslim melalui media sosial dan internet.Menurut tuduhan yang tidak berdasar, "Pokemon" berarti "Saya orang Yahudi" di Syria, sementara nama makhluk itu "Pikachu" dan "Charmander" berarti "menjadi seorang Yahudi", dan "Tuhan itu lemah"."Pokemon" diterbitkan oleh Nintendo Company, dan namanya adalah singkatan dari kata "monster saku", merujuk pada 722 makhluk lucu yang dikumpulkan pemain dalam video game.Baru -baru ini, Perak Mufti Tan Sri Harussani Zakaria telah menyarankan agar Malaysia melarang aplikasi game "augmented reality" Pokemon Go karena dianggap perjudian.Pahang mufti datuk seri Abdul Rahman Osman juga berpikir itu harus dilarang jika terbukti mengandung elemen perjudian.

berita: The riot occurred at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Prison, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, Friday (10/11/2017) afternoon. According to Karo Penmas, Police Public Relations Division, Brigadier General Rikwanto, the commotion occurred around 16.00 WIB. Rikwanto explained that after Friday prayers, the detainees were put into their respective cells by the Densus 88 team. While carrying out these activities, the Densus 88 team conducted a search. There are 4 pieces of HP found. "Four cellphones were found, belonging to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam and Jumali," he said as quoted by a number of online media. One of the detainees did not accept the search. "It is true that with the inspection activity, one of the prisoners did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words, then some members were provoked by their words and there were prisoners who while takbir loudly so that they provoked the prisoners of the next block," he explained. As a result, riots ensued. A number of facilities in the prison were damaged. "The prison cell door was broken into, the gate of the block hallway, the window panes (in Block C fill and Block B)," said Rikwanto. While the information that spread and went viral on social media said the cause of the commotion began when officers entered the isolation room of the cleric's detainees. It is said, the anger of the prisoners peaked when the officers scrambled the books of monotheism, threw other books and the Koran. In the Youtube sharing information show "Second of Riots at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java" which was also viral, the prisoners were seen screaming because they did not accept the treatment by the authorities of the Al-Qur'an and other books belonging to the prisoners. . "We don't mind having our cellphones taken, but don't destroy our Koran and books!" exclaimed a prisoner in a video sharing Youtube that aired on Friday, November 10, 2017. The prisoners who did not accept the abuse were also takbir. Several warning shots were heard from the police. The prisoners looked more and more emotional. According to Rikwanto, the incident did not last long. The authorities immediately took control of the situation. Rikwanto also denied that this incident was triggered by the throwing and harassment of the Koran by the authorities. "It's a hoax," he said. There are no victims in this riot
berita_id: Kerusuhan itu terjadi di Penjara Markas Besar Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, Jumat (10/11/2017) sore.Menurut Karo Penmas, Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Polisi, Jenderal Brigadir Rikwanto, keributan itu terjadi sekitar 16.00 WIB.Rikwanto menjelaskan bahwa setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing oleh tim Densus 88.Saat melakukan kegiatan ini, tim Densus 88 melakukan pencarian.Ada 4 potong HP yang ditemukan."Empat ponsel ditemukan, milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam dan Jumali," katanya seperti dikutip oleh sejumlah media online.Salah satu tahanan tidak menerima pencarian."Memang benar bahwa dengan kegiatan inspeksi, salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memprovokasi para petugas dengan berbagai kata, kemudian beberapa anggota diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka dan ada tahanan yang sementara Takbir dengan keras sehingga mereka memicu tahanan blok berikutnya," jelasnya.Akibatnya, kerusuhan terjadi.Sejumlah fasilitas di penjara rusak."Pintu sel penjara dipecah, gerbang lorong blok, panel jendela (di blok C mengisi dan blok B)," kata Rikwanto.Sementara informasi yang menyebar dan menjadi viral di media sosial mengatakan penyebab keributan dimulai ketika petugas memasuki ruang isolasi tahanan ulama.Dikatakan, kemarahan para tahanan memuncak ketika para petugas mengacaukan buku -buku monoteisme, melemparkan buku -buku lain dan Alquran.Dalam acara informasi berbagi YouTube "Riot kedua di markas Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat" yang juga viral, para tahanan terlihat berteriak karena mereka tidak menerima perlakuan oleh pihak berwenang al-Quran dan buku-buku lain milik para tahanan.."Kami tidak keberatan dengan ponsel kami diambil, tetapi jangan menghancurkan Alquran dan buku kami!"Seru seorang tahanan dalam video yang berbagi YouTube yang ditayangkan pada hari Jumat, 10 November 2017. Para tahanan yang tidak menerima pelecehan itu juga Takbir.Beberapa tembakan peringatan terdengar dari polisi.Para tahanan terlihat semakin emosional.Menurut Rikwanto, insiden itu tidak bertahan lama.Pihak berwenang segera mengendalikan situasi.Rikwanto juga membantah bahwa kejadian ini dipicu oleh lemparan dan pelecehan Alquran oleh pihak berwenang."Ini tipuan," katanya.Tidak ada korban dalam kerusuhan ini

berita: US troops have seized classified documents showing former Iraqi President Saddam Hussein suspected Pokemon. The suspicion arose when the Pokemon TV series was popular among children, in 2001, to be exact. Reporting from the Mirror page, the document says Saddam Hussein banned Pokemon from showing because it confiscate means 'I am a Jew'. The following notes in the document; We have become aware of a rapidly spreading phenomenon in the Muslim world and among our children. Our children have become attached to this phenomenon. The names in this phenomenon have many meanings, such as: Pokemon: Means 'I am a Jew'. Charmander: Means 'God is weak'. Pikachu: Means 'Be a Jew'.
berita_id: Pasukan AS telah menyita dokumen rahasia yang menunjukkan mantan presiden Irak Saddam Hussein tersangka Pokemon.Kecurigaan muncul ketika serial TV Pokemon populer di kalangan anak -anak, pada tahun 2001, tepatnya.Melaporkan dari halaman Mirror, dokumen itu mengatakan Saddam Hussein melarang Pokemon karena disita berarti 'Saya seorang Yahudi'.Catatan berikut dalam dokumen;Kami telah menyadari fenomena yang menyebar dengan cepat di dunia Muslim dan di antara anak -anak kami.Anak -anak kita telah terikat pada fenomena ini.Nama -nama dalam fenomena ini memiliki banyak makna, seperti: Pokemon: berarti 'Saya seorang Yahudi'.Charmander: Berarti 'Tuhan itu lemah'.Pikachu: Berarti 'menjadi orang Yahudi'.

berita: A number of terrorist prisoners at the Kelapa Dua Detention Center, Depok, West Java were involved in a commotion, which caused damage to a number of facilities at the detention center. Rumors circulated that the commotion was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by officers from Densus 88 Anti-terror. This news was denied by the Head of the Public Information Division of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Headquarters, Senior Commissioner Martinus Sitompul. The former Head of Public Relations of the Polda Metro Jaya confirmed that the commotion was suspected to be a search by officers of a number of terrorist prisoners. "It is not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard," said Martinus in a written statement, Friday, November 10 2017. At the time of the incident, said Martinus, what the officers did was to check the books and objects in the cell. ''What is there is that the officers conducted an examination of the books and objects in the cell,'' he said. Previously, information was circulating on social networks that this commotion was suspected to put down have been caused by the throwing of the Koran by officers. Because of that, the prisoners then went on a rampage and damaged a number of detention facilities. "There has been a riot at the Headquarters of Brimob Kelapa Dua, two depots where terrorist prisoners burned and destroyed the room because the guard Ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk," reads a fragment of information that is suspected to be a hoax, circulating in the public. Security Tightened Meanwhile, since the commotion in the area of ​​Blocks C and B of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua Depok, at the location until Friday night, several officers were seen on guard. A Baracuda car and a number of motorized police officers dressed in all black were seen entering the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua Depok, on guard. There is no explanation about the tightening of this security by the police. The officers on standby even asked the media crew to stay away from the location. ''Go, not here,'' said an officer while asking a number of media crew who were at the main gate of Mako Brimob Depok to leave.
berita_id: Sejumlah tahanan teroris di Pusat Penahanan Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat terlibat dalam keributan, yang menyebabkan kerusakan pada sejumlah fasilitas di pusat penahanan.Rumor beredar bahwa keributan dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas dari Densus 88 Anti-teror.Berita ini ditolak oleh kepala Divisi Informasi Publik Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat dari Markas Kepolisian Nasional, Komisaris Senior Martinus Sitompul.Mantan kepala hubungan masyarakat Metro Polda Jaya mengkonfirmasi bahwa keributan itu dicurigai sebagai pencarian oleh petugas dari sejumlah tahanan teroris."Tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga," kata Martinus dalam sebuah pernyataan tertulis, Jumat, 10 November 2017. Pada saat insiden itu, kata Martinus, apa yang dilakukan petugas adalah memeriksa buku dan benda di dalam sel.'' Apa yang ada bahwa para petugas melakukan pemeriksaan buku dan benda -benda di dalam sel, '' katanya.Sebelumnya, informasi beredar di jejaring sosial yang diduga keributan ini disebabkan oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas.Karena itu, para tahanan kemudian mengamuk dan merusak sejumlah fasilitas penahanan."Telah ada kerusuhan di markas Brimob Kelapa Dua, dua depot di mana tahanan teroris membakar dan menghancurkan ruangan itu karena penjaga Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk," membaca sebuah fragmen informasi yang diduga menjadi tipuan, beredar di publik.Sementara itu, keamanan diperketat, karena keributan di area blok C dan B dari markas Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua Depok, di lokasi hingga Jumat malam, beberapa petugas terlihat berjaga -jaga.Sebuah mobil Baracuda dan sejumlah petugas polisi bermotor yang berpakaian hitam terlihat memasuki markas Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua Depok, berjaga -jaga.Tidak ada penjelasan tentang pengetatan keamanan ini oleh polisi.Para petugas siaga bahkan meminta kru media untuk menjauh dari lokasi.'' Pergi, tidak di sini, '' kata seorang petugas sambil meminta sejumlah kru media yang berada di gerbang utama Mako Brimob Depok untuk pergi.

berita: On Tuesday (21/2) morning, news circulated on social media about the closure of the gates of the Istiqlal Mosque for visitors. The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI) felt the need to provide clarification. In an official statement received by Republika.co.id, Tuesday (21/2), the beg Secretary of the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI), Rusli Effendi, clarified that what had been circulating so far did not lead to misunderstandings. BPPMI also appeals to all Muslims not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for. The news about the locking of the mosque so that people cannot pray Fajr is a hoax or a lie. The closing of the mosque is already a regulation or procedure at Istiqlal. The following is an explanation: The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency since 2002 has enforced a rule (SOP), closing the gates every night at 21.30. The mosque was reopened in the morning at 03.40, ahead of the Fajr prayer service. This rule (SOP) was enforced in order to optimize mosque security at night. All pilgrims are not allowed to stay in the Istiqlal Mosque area, except under certain conditions and with the permission of the security forces and the leadership of BPPMI. Regarding the conditions at night from 20 to the early hours of February 21 2017, the Istiqlal Mosque security forces have explained to the worshipers gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque about the procedure and they understand and are willing to leave the Istiqlal Mosque area. BPPMI did not receive notification from any party regarding the plans for the congregation to stay overnight as in the previous conditions when Muslims held 411, 212 or 112 actions. There was also no special communication from the authorities regarding this matter. The Istiqlal Mosque always serves the people and strives for national unity and unity, and always maintains the comfort of worship. BPPMI stated that the negative news that had been spread on social media regarding the above matters did not correspond to reality and tended to contain provocations. BPPMI appeals to all Muslims to be asked not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for. The implementation of the Fajr prayer at the Istiqlal Mosque today went well and smoothly, led by Ustaz Salim Ghazali. The number of worshipers is about 240 people (170 men and 70 women).
berita_id: Pada hari Selasa (21/2) pagi, berita beredar di media sosial tentang penutupan gerbang masjid Istiqlal untuk pengunjung.Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI) merasa perlu untuk memberikan klarifikasi.Dalam pernyataan resmi yang diterima oleh Republika.co.id, Selasa (21/2), sekretaris BEG dari Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI), Rusli Effendi, mengklarifikasi bahwa apa yang telah beredar sejauh ini tidak mengarah pada kesalahpahaman.BPPMI juga menarik bagi semua Muslim untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan.Berita tentang penguncian masjid sehingga orang tidak dapat berdoa fajr adalah tipuan atau kebohongan.Penutupan masjid sudah menjadi peraturan atau prosedur di ISTIQLAL.Berikut ini adalah penjelasan: Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal sejak tahun 2002 telah menegakkan aturan (SOP), menutup gerbang setiap malam pukul 21.30.Masjid dibuka kembali di pagi hari pukul 03.40, di depan Layanan Doa Fajr.Aturan ini (SOP) ditegakkan untuk mengoptimalkan keamanan masjid di malam hari.Semua peziarah tidak diizinkan untuk tinggal di daerah Masjid Istiqlal, kecuali dalam kondisi tertentu dan dengan izin pasukan keamanan dan kepemimpinan BPPMI.Mengenai kondisi pada malam hari dari 20 hingga jam awal 21 Februari 2017, pasukan keamanan masjid Istiqlal telah menjelaskan kepada para penyembah yang berkumpul di halaman masjid Istiqlal tentang prosedur dan mereka mengerti dan bersedia meninggalkan daerah masjid Istiqlal.BPPMI tidak menerima pemberitahuan dari pihak mana pun mengenai rencana untuk jemaat untuk menginap seperti dalam kondisi sebelumnya ketika Muslim mengadakan tindakan 411, 212 atau 112.Juga tidak ada komunikasi khusus dari pihak berwenang mengenai masalah ini.Masjid Istiqlal selalu melayani orang -orang dan berjuang untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional, dan selalu mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah.BPPMI menyatakan bahwa berita negatif yang telah tersebar di media sosial mengenai hal -hal di atas tidak sesuai dengan kenyataan dan cenderung mengandung provokasi.BPPMI menarik semua Muslim untuk diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan.Implementasi Doa Fajr di Masjid Istiqlal hari ini berjalan dengan baik dan lancar, dipimpin oleh Ustaz Salim Ghazali.Jumlah penyembah adalah sekitar 240 orang (170 pria dan 70 wanita).

berita: One million Facebook accounts in Indonesia were reportedly leaked, angering the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara. According to Rudiantara, the government is ready to turn off Facebook access in Indonesia if needed. The one million data on Facebook users in Indonesia was used by Cambridge Analytica. In addition to the leak of Facebook accounts, it had also exacerbated the massacre of the Rohingya in Myanmar. "I made a statement that if I had to shutdown, I would shutdown. So the government has no doubts about it if the facts are sufficient," said Rudiantara at the Presidential Palace Complex, Jakarta, Thursday, April 5 2018. Rudiantara added, in an interview. With international media, Facebook's role in Myanmar has take been recognized by its leader, Mark Zuckerberg. Facebook is used as a medium for spreading hate speech against the ethnic groups who were forced to flee to Bangladesh. Rudiantara said that the Ministry of Communication and Information held a meeting this afternoon with representatives of Facebook in Indonesia. The government will ask for direct clarification regarding the truth about the data leak, as well as the use of Facebook for bad things.
berita_id: Satu juta akun Facebook di Indonesia dilaporkan bocor, membuat marah Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara.Menurut Rudiantara, pemerintah siap untuk mematikan akses Facebook di Indonesia jika diperlukan.Data satu juta pada pengguna Facebook di Indonesia digunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica.Selain kebocoran akun Facebook, itu juga telah memperburuk pembantaian Rohingya di Myanmar."Saya membuat pernyataan bahwa jika saya harus menutup, saya akan menutup. Jadi pemerintah tidak memiliki keraguan tentang hal itu jika faktanya cukup," kata Rudiiantara di kompleks Istana Presiden, Jakarta, Kamis, 5 April 2018. Rudiantara menambahkan, dalam sebuah wawancara.Dengan media internasional, peran Facebook di Myanmar telah diakui oleh pemimpinnya, Mark Zuckerberg.Facebook digunakan sebagai media untuk menyebarkan pidato kebencian terhadap kelompok etnis yang terpaksa melarikan diri ke Bangladesh.Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi mengadakan pertemuan sore ini dengan perwakilan Facebook di Indonesia.Pemerintah akan meminta klarifikasi langsung mengenai kebenaran tentang kebocoran data, serta penggunaan Facebook untuk hal -hal buruk.

berita: The Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI) straightened out the information circulating on social media regarding the closing of the gates for visitors the night before the 212 Action. According escritoire to the Secretary of BPPMI KH Rusli Effendi, since 2002 his party has enforced rules to close all gates every night at 21.30 WIB and reopened at 03.40 WIB before the Fajr prayer. "All pilgrims are not allowed to stay in the mosque area except under certain conditions and with permission from the security forces and the leadership of BPPMI," said Rusli in Jakarta, Tuesday (21/2). Regarding the conditions at night from 20 until the early hours of February 21, the security of the Istiqlal Mosque had explained to the congregation (participants of the 212 action) who had gathered in the mosque's courtyard about the procedure. "They understand and are willing to leave the mosque area," he said. According to Rusli, BPPMI did not receive notification from any party regarding the plans for the congregation to stay overnight as in the previous conditions when Muslims held 411, 212 or 112 actions. There was also no special communication from the authorities regarding this matter. "The Istiqlal Mosque is always devoted to the people and strives for national unity and unity and always maintains the comfort of worship. We urge all Muslims not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for," he concluded. , there are pictures circulating in cyberspace, especially on social media, which report that the Istiqlal Mosque is closed with a padlock and given barbed wire, so that the masses who will take part in the action cannot enter and sleep on the streets. The head of the Protocol Section for the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah, immediately denied the accusation, and declared it a hoax. Because, according to Hurairah, his party has never banned the action and has never locked the door of the mosque. "A thousand percent hoax," said Abu when contacted by reporters on Tuesday (21/2). Then, after the hoax image was circulated, two more images of police (snipers) holding weapons were circulated, where one was at a bus stop spying on the highway and the other was in a room spying on the DPR building. Not only that, the two edited images (pictures of police snipers) have metamorphosed into meme images. The two images were combined with the hoax image of the locking of the Istiqlal Mosque for the masses of the 212th Volume II Action. The image is edited and arranged vertically (top-bottom). In the image above, it is captioned: "The door of the Istiqlal mosque is locked and barbed wire." Meanwhile, in the lower image, it is captioned: "Snipers are prepared in the capitol building. Oh God, are we already considered enemies in our own country?" The question is, is the information in the image below true? If you pay attention to the issue of the locking of the Istiqlal mosque which has been declared a hoax, it is not impossible that the picture (police sniper) was also a hoax. Moreover, from the circulating photos, there is no real evidence to show that the sniper police were stalking the masses of action. This case is similar to the issue that had circulated some time before the 411 action was held at the end of 2016. At that time, the police were also accused of the same thing: they would prepare snipers to secure the action. Responding to this, the Head of Public Relations of the Polda Metro Jaya Kombes Pol Awi Setiyono emphasized that his party would not deploy snipers or snipers during the 411th action related to the alleged blasphemy committed by Basuki Tjahaja Purnama alias Ahok. "Nothing, nothing," said Awi at the Metro Jaya Police Headquarters, Thursday, November 3, 2016.
berita_id: Badan Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal (BPPMI) meluruskan informasi yang beredar di media sosial mengenai penutupan gerbang bagi pengunjung malam sebelum aksi 212.Menurut Escritoire kepada Sekretaris Bppmi Kh Rusli Effendi, sejak tahun 2002 partainya telah menegakkan aturan untuk menutup semua gerbang setiap malam pukul 21.30 WIB dan dibuka kembali pada 03.40 WIB sebelum doa Fajr."Semua peziarah tidak diizinkan untuk tinggal di daerah masjid kecuali dalam kondisi tertentu dan dengan izin dari pasukan keamanan dan kepemimpinan BPPMI," kata Rusli di Jakarta, Selasa (21/2).Mengenai kondisi di malam hari dari 20 hingga jam awal 21 Februari, keamanan masjid Istiqlal telah menjelaskan kepada jemaat (peserta aksi 212) yang telah berkumpul di halaman masjid tentang prosedur tersebut."Mereka mengerti dan bersedia meninggalkan daerah masjid," katanya.Menurut Rusli, BPPMI tidak menerima pemberitahuan dari pihak mana pun mengenai rencana jemaat untuk menginap seperti dalam kondisi sebelumnya ketika Muslim memegang 411, 212 atau 112 tindakan.Juga tidak ada komunikasi khusus dari pihak berwenang mengenai masalah ini."Masjid Istiqlal selalu dikhususkan untuk orang -orang dan berusaha untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional dan selalu mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah. Kami mendesak semua Muslim untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan," pungkasnya., ada gambar yang beredar di dunia maya, terutama di media sosial, yang melaporkan bahwa masjid Istiqlal ditutup dengan gembok dan diberi kawat berduri, sehingga massa yang akan mengambil bagian dalam aksi tidak dapat masuk dan tidur di jalanan.Kepala bagian protokol untuk masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah, segera membantah tuduhan itu, dan menyatakan itu tipuan.Karena, menurut Hurairah, partainya tidak pernah melarang aksinya dan tidak pernah mengunci pintu masjid."Seribu persen tipuan," kata Abu ketika dihubungi oleh wartawan pada hari Selasa (21/2).Kemudian, setelah gambar tipuan diedarkan, dua gambar polisi (penembak jitu) yang memegang senjata diedarkan, di mana satu di halte bus memata -matai di jalan raya dan yang lainnya berada di sebuah ruangan yang memata -matai di gedung DPR.Tidak hanya itu, dua gambar yang diedit (gambar penembak jitu polisi) telah bermetamorfosis menjadi gambar meme.Dua gambar dikombinasikan dengan gambar tipuan dari penguncian masjid Istiqlal untuk massa aksi Volume II ke -212.Gambar diedit dan diatur secara vertikal (top-bottom).Pada gambar di atas, itu ditulis: "Pintu masjid Istiqlal terkunci dan kawat berduri."Sementara itu, dalam gambar yang lebih rendah, itu ditulis: "Penembak jitu disiapkan di gedung Capitol. Ya Tuhan, apakah kita sudah dianggap musuh di negara kita sendiri?"Pertanyaannya adalah, apakah informasi pada gambar di bawah ini benar?Jika Anda memperhatikan masalah penguncian masjid Istiqlal yang telah dinyatakan tipuan, bukan tidak mungkin gambar (penembak jitu polisi) juga berupa tipuan.Selain itu, dari foto yang beredar, tidak ada bukti nyata yang menunjukkan bahwa polisi Sniper menguntit massa tindakan.Kasus ini mirip dengan masalah yang telah beredar beberapa waktu sebelum tindakan 411 diadakan pada akhir 2016. Pada waktu itu, polisi juga dituduh melakukan hal yang sama: mereka akan mempersiapkan penembak jitu untuk mengamankan tindakan tersebut.Menanggapi hal ini, kepala hubungan masyarakat Metro Polda Jaya Kombes Pol Awi Setiyono menekankan bahwa partainya tidak akan mengerahkan penembak jitu atau penembak jitu selama tindakan ke -411 yang terkait dengan dugaan penistaan ​​yang dilakukan oleh Basuki Tjahaja Purnama Ahok."Tidak ada, tidak ada," kata Awi di markas polisi Metro Jaya, Kamis, 3 November 2016.

berita: A commotion reportedly occurred at the Brimob Corps Terrorist Detention Center, Salemba Rutan Branch, Friday (10/11) afternoon at around 16.00 WIB. The uproar was carried out by terrorist prisoners which resulted in the destruction of a number of prison facilities. A message spread in the media said that the trigger for the riot was caused by officers throwing the holy Koran. Through his written statement, the Head of the Public Information Bureau of the Police Brigadier General Rikwanto said the chain message was a hoax. The hoax message reads: #Updates #mako_brimob #riot There has been a riot at the Headquarters of Brimob Kelapa Dua, two depots where the terrorist prisoners burned and destroyed the room because the guard Ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk. Until now, the rioting at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters is still continuing. 3 blocks burned and the door was destroyed. Everyone, pray for our brothers and tumult sisters who are being held at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters. #AlfathChannel Rikwanto also denied the message. Meanwhile, through his written statement, Rikwanto explained that after Friday prayers, the prisoners were put into their respective cells. After entering, the Densus picket removed the key in rooms A5 and C5 (RB) because there was a key slot from the inside. "For security purposes and to make it easier for the picket officer to open the cell door," explained Rikwanto in his written statement, Friday (11/10). While carrying out these activities, the Densus picket conducted a search in the room and found 4 cell phones. The cellphones belonged to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam and Jumali. Because of the investigation, one of the detainees felt disapproved and provoked the officers with various kinds of words. "Then there are members who are provoked by their words and there are prisoners who while takbir loudly so that they provoke prisoners from the block next to them," explained Rikwanto. The picket members also took action by shooting upwards to signal a commotion and warn the inmates. At this time, the atmosphere can be appeased by the picket members. "After that, members were on standby in picket while waiting for developments, but the prisoners still had takbir takbir, triggering others," he continued.
berita_id: Keributan dilaporkan terjadi di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Korps Brimob, Cabang Salemba Rutan, Jumat (10/11) sore sekitar pukul 16.00 WIB.Keributan itu dilakukan oleh para tahanan teroris yang mengakibatkan penghancuran sejumlah fasilitas penjara.Sebuah pesan yang tersebar di media mengatakan bahwa pemicu kerusuhan itu disebabkan oleh petugas yang melemparkan Alquran.Melalui pernyataan tertulisnya, kepala Biro Informasi Publik Brigadir Jenderal Polisi Rikwanto mengatakan pesan rantai itu adalah tipuan.Pesan Hoax berbunyi: #updates #mako_brimob #riot Telah ada kerusuhan di markas Brimob Kelapa Dua, dua depot di mana para tahanan teroris membakar dan menghancurkan ruangan itu karena penjaga Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alban dan menyebabkan para tahanan pergi keengganan.Sampai sekarang, kerusuhan di markas komando brigade seluler masih berlanjut.3 blok terbakar dan pintu dihancurkan.Semua orang, berdoa untuk saudara -saudari kita dan saudara -saudari yang ditahan di markas komando brigade seluler.#Alfathchannel Rikwanto juga membantah pesan itu.Sementara itu, melalui pernyataan tertulisnya, Rikwanto menjelaskan bahwa setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing.Setelah masuk, piket densus melepas kunci di kamar A5 dan C5 (RB) karena ada slot kunci dari dalam."Untuk tujuan keamanan dan memudahkan petugas piket untuk membuka pintu sel," jelas Rikwanto dalam pernyataan tertulisnya, Jumat (11/10).Saat melakukan kegiatan ini, piket densus melakukan pencarian di ruangan itu dan menemukan 4 ponsel.Ponsel milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam dan Jumali.Karena penyelidikan, salah satu tahanan merasa tidak setuju dan memprovokasi petugas dengan berbagai jenis kata."Lalu ada anggota yang diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka dan ada tahanan yang sementara Takbir dengan keras sehingga mereka memancing tahanan dari blok di sebelah mereka," jelas Rikwanto.Anggota piket juga mengambil tindakan dengan menembak ke atas untuk menandakan keributan dan memperingatkan para narapidana.Pada saat ini, suasananya dapat ditenangkan oleh anggota piket."Setelah itu, anggota siaga di piket sambil menunggu perkembangan, tetapi para tahanan masih memiliki Takbir Takbir, memicu orang lain," lanjutnya.

berita: The Pokemon Go game is currently booming among young people. Not a few people who have a pokemon fever and are willing to blusukan in search of Pokemon. However, this game made by Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, and Niantic Labs can't be separated from oblique issues. Recently, there have been many links circulating on social media stating that the game contains an invitation that cannot be tolerated by Islam. It is widely circulated on social media that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am Jewish", while Pikachu is said to mean "Be Jewish", and Charmander means "God is Weak". The rumor has certainly become a heated debate on social media. Many believed and shared the rumor, many thought it was just something that was linked. So is that really the issue? The Los Angels Times in an article dated April 24, 2001 once reviewed this. In the LA Times, it was stated that at that time in Middle Eastern countries such as Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia, there were many rumors that the Pokemon game had connotations that promoted anti-Islamic behavior and believed in Judaism. This of course causes anxiety. The LA Times noted that despite Nintendo's denials, the leaders of those countries still couldn't accept Pokemon. The rumors arose amid concerns Arab countries would assimilate the emerging culture. Even so, many rumors were not proven at that time. "It has been proven that this toy is part of a Jewish plot to corrupt the minds of our young generation because it offends blasphemous thoughts, mocks God and our moral values ​​so that it is very dangerous for our young generation," said Sheik Abdel Monem abu Zent, ​​former member Jordanian parliament. Even so, in the LA Times article, he stated that there was no strong evidence that the Pokemon game did have connotations that were detrimental to terminus Islam. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor from Al Azhar University, said that until now there was no solid evidence that confirmed the rumors that made parents forbid their children to play the Pokemon game. In a statement in Jordan's Amman newspaper, the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church denied allegations that Pokemon and other character names have roots in ancient Syriac and insult Islam. Church officials said they were surprised by the incoming letter stating that Pokemon contained a Jewish invitation. The article from the LA Times can be read at the following link. In the pokemondb.net site, the meaning of the Pokemon names and the names of the monsters is mentioned. On the site it is stated that Pokemon is a combination of the word "Pocket Monster" which means pocket monster. This term expresses how small these monsters are to fit in a pocket. Pikachu which is one of the most famous monsters is composed of the words Pika and Chu. Pika is the name for a small mouse, while Chu is a Japanese word which means to squeak. In the game, Pikachu is indeed a monster that looks like a mouse. Meanwhile, Charmander consists of the words Char and Salamander. Char means to burn, and Salamander means amphibious lizard.
berita_id: Permainan Pokemon Go saat ini sedang booming di kalangan anak muda.Tidak sedikit orang yang mengalami demam Pokemon dan bersedia untuk Blusukan untuk mencari Pokemon.Namun, game ini dibuat oleh Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, dan Niantic Labs tidak dapat dipisahkan dari masalah miring.Baru -baru ini, ada banyak tautan yang beredar di media sosial yang menyatakan bahwa permainan berisi undangan yang tidak dapat ditoleransi oleh Islam.Secara luas diedarkan di media sosial bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya di Syria atau Syria berarti "Saya Yahudi", sementara Pikachu dikatakan berarti "menjadi Yahudi", dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Rumor itu tentu saja menjadi perdebatan panas di media sosial.Banyak yang percaya dan berbagi rumor, banyak yang mengira itu hanya sesuatu yang terkait.Jadi apakah itu masalahnya?The Los Angels Times dalam sebuah artikel tertanggal 24 April 2001 pernah meninjau ini.Di LA Times, dinyatakan bahwa pada waktu itu di negara-negara Timur Tengah seperti Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Yordania, Mesir, dan Arab Saudi, ada banyak desas-desus bahwa permainan Pokemon memiliki konotasi yang mempromosikan perilaku anti-Islam dan percaya pada Yudaisme.Ini tentu saja menyebabkan kecemasan.The LA Times mencatat bahwa terlepas dari penolakan Nintendo, para pemimpin negara -negara itu masih tidak dapat menerima Pokemon.Rumor muncul di tengah kekhawatiran negara -negara Arab akan mengasimilasi budaya yang muncul.Meski begitu, banyak rumor tidak terbukti pada waktu itu."Telah terbukti bahwa mainan ini adalah bagian dari rencana Yahudi untuk merusak pikiran generasi muda kita karena menyinggung pikiran menghujat, mengejek Tuhan dan nilai -nilai moral kita sehingga sangat berbahaya bagi generasi muda kita," kata Sheik Abdel Monem Abu Zent, ​​mantan anggota parlemen Yordania.Meski begitu, dalam artikel LA Times, ia menyatakan bahwa tidak ada bukti kuat bahwa permainan Pokemon memang memiliki konotasi yang merugikan Islam Terminus.Mohammed Abu Laila, seorang profesor dari Universitas Al Azhar, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti kuat yang mengkonfirmasi rumor yang membuat orang tua melarang anak -anak mereka untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon.Dalam sebuah pernyataan di surat kabar Amman Jordan, Gereja Kristen Syria Ortodoks membantah tuduhan bahwa Pokemon dan nama karakter lainnya berakar pada Syria kuno dan menghina Islam.Pejabat gereja mengatakan mereka terkejut dengan surat yang masuk yang menyatakan bahwa Pokemon berisi undangan Yahudi.Artikel dari LA Times dapat dibaca di tautan berikut.Di situs Pokemondb.net, arti nama Pokemon dan nama -nama monster disebutkan.Di situs tersebut dinyatakan bahwa Pokemon adalah kombinasi dari kata "monster saku" yang berarti monster saku.Istilah ini mengungkapkan betapa kecilnya monster ini agar muat di saku.Pikachu yang merupakan salah satu monster paling terkenal terdiri dari kata -kata Pika dan Chu.Pika adalah nama untuk tikus kecil, sedangkan Chu adalah kata Jepang yang berarti mencicit.Dalam permainan, Pikachu memang monster yang terlihat seperti tikus.Sementara itu, Charmander terdiri dari kata -kata Char dan Salamander.Char berarti membakar, dan salamander berarti kadal amfibi.

berita: In the midst of high consumer demand for the latest smartphone Apple iPhone 6 Plus, unpleasant news circulated. A small number of iPhone 6 Plus big screen mobile phone users reportedly complain because their smartphone is easy to bend or bend when placed in a pocket. (Read: Sales of Apple iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus Reach 10 Million Units) Some users have reported the issue via forums on the internet complete with photos of the iPhone 6 Plus curving, generally in the middle to the top of the handset, according to a report published by ZD Net (24/9/2014). The folding of the iPhone 6 Plus which is equipped with a 5.5-inch screen is predicted because of the pressure when the user sits when the cellphone is in the back pocket wandering of his pants. However, through the MacRumors forum, one of the owners of the iPhone 6 Plus with the name 'hanzoh' claimed that his cellphone was damaged (bent) after being stored in the front pocket of his pants for about 18 hours. (Read: Launches Galaxy Note 4, Samsung: iPhone 6 Plus Just Mimics) iPhone 6 Plus is by far the slimmest smartphone from Apple with a thickness of about 7.1 mm and a length of about 16cm. Some owners of these cellphones speculate that the iPhone 6 Plus bends easily because its body is too thin. So far, Apple has not been willing to comment.
berita_id: Di tengah -tengah permintaan konsumen tinggi untuk smartphone terbaru Apple iPhone 6 Plus, berita yang tidak menyenangkan beredar.Sejumlah kecil iPhone 6 ditambah pengguna ponsel layar lebar dilaporkan mengeluh karena smartphone mereka mudah ditekuk atau ditekuk saat ditempatkan di saku.(Baca: Penjualan Apple iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus mencapai 10 juta unit) Beberapa pengguna telah melaporkan masalah ini melalui forum di internet lengkap dengan foto -foto IPhone 6 Plus Curving, umumnya di tengah ke atas handset, menurut laporan yang diterbitkan oleh ZD Net (24/9/2014).Lipat iPhone 6 Plus yang dilengkapi dengan layar 5,5 inci diprediksi karena tekanan ketika pengguna duduk ketika ponsel berada di saku belakang berkeliaran di celananya.Namun, melalui Forum Macrumors, salah satu pemilik iPhone 6 Plus dengan nama 'Hanzoh' mengklaim bahwa ponselnya rusak (bengkok) setelah disimpan di saku depan celananya selama sekitar 18 jam.(Baca: Meluncurkan Galaxy Note 4, Samsung: iPhone 6 Plus Just Mimics) iPhone 6 Plus sejauh ini merupakan smartphone paling ramping dari Apple dengan ketebalan sekitar 7,1 mm dan panjang sekitar 16cm.Beberapa pemilik ponsel ini berspekulasi bahwa iPhone 6 Plus dengan mudah membungkuk karena tubuhnya terlalu tipis.Sejauh ini, Apple belum mau berkomentar.

berita: This news may be very useful for Indonesian consumers who intend to buy the iPhone 6 Plus when it is released in the Indonesian market later. After a few days of being released in a number of countries, Apple's brand-new 5.5-inch jumbo smartphone began to reap protests from users. According to reports by some iPhone 6 Plus users, the iPhone with the largest sail turns out to be easy to bend if it's kept in a trouser pocket for too long. This incident was first reported by an iPhone 6 owner named Hanzon on the MacRumors forum site. He admitted that he kept the iPhone 6 Plus in his trouser pocket for approximately 4 hours, and carried out daily activities as usual. When taken out, Hanzon was surprised when he saw that the center of his iPhone 6 Plus was slightly 'bent', aka curved. Not only Hanzon, the MacRumors page launched, another user named Devin Pitcher also expressed a similar complaint on the forum. Devin admitted that he kept his new iPhone 6 Plus in his front trouser pocket. When removed, the center of the iPhone 6 Plus is curved like a tank that can withstand pressure. The use of a large 5.5-inch screen is indeed feared to interfere with user comfort. Apple has also anticipated by moving the Power button which is usually placed at the top to the right side to make it rectify easier to use with one hand. But the problem of large dimensions limiting user comfort when storing it in a trouser pocket does not seem to have occurred to Apple. In addition, Apple is also considered to have made a mistake by choosing a metal-aluminum mixture that is not too solid as the base material for the iPhone 6 Plus frame. Maybe the Iphone Frame has not passed the UTM (Universal Testing Machine) Test. The UTM test functions to test the iPhone 6 plus frame by pressing and pulling it to the maximum limit. If the force needed to bend the iPhone is small, it means it is easy to bend What is UTM? Universal Testing Machine is a testing machine to test tensile stress and compressive strength of materials or materials. Universal Testing Machine, usually also known as Universal Tester, Materials Testing Machine or Materials Test Frame. This testing machine has proven that it can perform many standard tensile and compression tests on materials, components and structures
berita_id: Berita ini mungkin sangat berguna bagi konsumen Indonesia yang berniat membeli iPhone 6 Plus ketika dirilis di pasar Indonesia nanti.Setelah beberapa hari dirilis di sejumlah negara, smartphone Jumbo 5,5 inci baru dari Apple mulai menuai protes dari pengguna.Menurut laporan oleh beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone dengan layar terbesar ternyata mudah ditekuk jika terlalu lama disimpan di saku celana panjang.Insiden ini pertama kali dilaporkan oleh pemilik iPhone 6 bernama Hanzon di situs Forum MacRumors.Dia mengakui bahwa dia menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana panjangnya selama sekitar 4 jam, dan melakukan kegiatan sehari -hari seperti biasa.Ketika dikeluarkan, Hanzon terkejut ketika dia melihat bahwa pusat iPhone 6 -nya sedikit 'bengkok', alias melengkung.Tidak hanya Hanzon, halaman MacRumors diluncurkan, pengguna lain bernama Devin Pitcher juga menyatakan keluhan serupa di forum tersebut.Devin mengakui bahwa ia menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus barunya di saku celana depannya.Saat dilepas, pusat iPhone 6 Plus melengkung seperti tangki yang dapat menahan tekanan.Penggunaan layar 5,5 inci besar memang ditakuti untuk mengganggu kenyamanan pengguna.Apple juga telah diantisipasi dengan memindahkan tombol daya yang biasanya ditempatkan di bagian atas ke sisi kanan untuk membuatnya lebih mudah digunakan dengan satu tangan.Tetapi masalah dimensi besar yang membatasi kenyamanan pengguna saat menyimpannya di saku celana tampaknya tidak terpikir oleh Apple.Selain itu, Apple juga dianggap telah membuat kesalahan dengan memilih campuran logam-aluminium yang tidak terlalu padat sebagai bahan dasar untuk bingkai iPhone 6 Plus.Mungkin bingkai iPhone belum lulus uji UTM (mesin pengujian universal).Uji UTM berfungsi untuk menguji bingkai iPhone 6 Plus dengan menekan dan menariknya ke batas maksimum.Jika kekuatan yang dibutuhkan untuk menekuk iPhone kecil, itu berarti mudah untuk menekuk apa itu UTM?Mesin pengujian universal adalah mesin pengujian untuk menguji tegangan tarik dan kekuatan tekan bahan atau bahan.Mesin pengujian universal, biasanya juga dikenal sebagai penguji universal, mesin pengujian bahan atau bingkai uji berita: Since this morning, news has circulated on social media that the Istiqlal Mosque has been locked, so that some of the congregants participating in the 212th volume II action cannot perform the Fajr prayer. However, the Public Relations Officer of the Istiqlal Mosque Management Agency (BPPMI), Abu Hurairah, denied the rumors. He stated that the news was a hoax. "BPPMI states that the negative news that has been spread on social media regarding this (the Istiqlal Mosque is locked), is not in accordance with reality and tends to get in contain provocations," said Abu Hurairah at the Istiqlal Mosque, Central Jakarta, Tuesday, February 21 2017. Abu said the Fajr prayer in congregation was still being held at the Istiqlal Mosque this morning. He noted, there were about 240 people who performed the Fajr prayer in congregation. "There are 170 men and 70 women," he said. Regarding the closure of mosques, Abu explained that the regulation has been implemented since 2002. Outside of Ramadan, the Istiqlal Mosque will be closed after Isha prayers until Fajr. "Since 2002, BPPMI has enforced rules to close gates every night at 21.30 WIB and reopen them in the morning at 03.40 WIB before the Fajr prayer is held," he said. Abu added that there were indeed a number of worshipers who came and stayed at the Istiqlal Mosque. They arrived from East Java using five buses. However, he said, BPPMI stated that it had not received any notification regarding the planned stay. So, permission to stay overnight was not given to the group last night. Abu admitted that the Istiqlal Mosque did allow the congregation of Action 411, 212 volume I and 112 to stay overnight. However, the action coordinator was asked to provide written information beforehand. "The Istiqlal Mosque security forces have explained to the congregation gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque about the procedure and they understand and are willing to leave the Istiqlal Mosque area," he said. Abu asked Muslims not to be influenced by the dubious and irresponsible news. The news that circulated was in the form of a photo showing the masses with a skullcap. They were in front of the gates of the Istiqlal Mosque at night. The news said the congregation was not allowed to perform the Fajr prayer at the Istiqlal Mosque. The news went viral on Twitter with the hashtag Istiqlal Padlocked. A number of photos show a number of people praying in congregation on the side of the road.
berita_id: Sejak pagi ini, berita telah beredar di media sosial bahwa masjid Istiqlal telah dikunci, sehingga beberapa jemaat yang berpartisipasi dalam aksi Volume II ke -212 tidak dapat melakukan doa Fajr.Namun, petugas hubungan masyarakat dari Badan Manajemen Masjid ISTIQLAL (BPPMI), Abu Hurairah, membantah desas -desus.Dia menyatakan bahwa berita itu adalah tipuan."BPPMI menyatakan bahwa berita negatif yang telah tersebar di media sosial mengenai hal ini (masjid ISTIQLAL terkunci), tidak sesuai dengan kenyataan dan cenderung mendapatkan provokasi," kata Abu Hurairah di Mosque ISTIQLAL di Jakarta yang diam, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017. Abu Mosque.Dia mencatat, ada sekitar 240 orang yang melakukan doa fajr di jemaat."Ada 170 pria dan 70 wanita," katanya.Mengenai penutupan masjid, Abu menjelaskan bahwa peraturan tersebut telah diterapkan sejak tahun 2002. Di luar Ramadhan, masjid Istiqlal akan ditutup setelah doa Isha sampai Fajr."Sejak 2002, BPPMI telah menegakkan aturan untuk menutup gerbang setiap malam pukul 21.30 WIB dan membukanya kembali di pagi hari pukul 03.40 WIB sebelum doa Fajr diadakan," katanya.Abu menambahkan bahwa memang ada sejumlah penyembah yang datang dan tinggal di masjid Istiqlal.Mereka tiba dari Jawa Timur menggunakan lima bus.Namun, katanya, BPPMI menyatakan bahwa mereka belum menerima pemberitahuan tentang masa menginap yang direncanakan.Jadi, izin untuk menginap tidak diberikan kepada kelompok tadi malam.Abu mengakui bahwa masjid Istiqlal memang memungkinkan jemaat aksi 411, 212 volume I dan 112 untuk menginap.Namun, koordinator tindakan diminta untuk memberikan informasi tertulis sebelumnya."Pasukan keamanan masjid Istiqlal telah menjelaskan kepada jemaat yang dikumpulkan di halaman Masjid Istiqlal tentang prosedur dan mereka mengerti dan bersedia meninggalkan wilayah Masjid Istiqlal," katanya.Abu meminta umat Islam untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang meragukan dan tidak bertanggung jawab.Berita yang beredar dalam bentuk foto yang menunjukkan massa dengan tengkorak.Mereka berada di depan gerbang masjid Istiqlal di malam hari.Berita itu mengatakan bahwa jemaat tidak diizinkan melakukan doa Fajr di masjid Istiqlal.Berita itu menjadi viral di Twitter dengan hashtag istiqlal yang digembok.Sejumlah foto menunjukkan sejumlah orang yang berdoa di jemaat di sisi jalan.

untuk beri informasi tulis sebelumnyapasukan aman masjid istiqlal telah jelas kepada jemaat yang kumpul di halaman masjid istiqlal tentang prosedur dan mereka erti dan sedia tinggal wilayah masjid istiqlal katanyaabu minta umat islam untuk tidak pengaruh oleh berita yang ragu dan tidak tanggung jawabberita yang edar dalam bentuk foto yang tunjuk massa dengan tengkorakmereka ada di depan gerbang masjid istiqlal di malam hariberita itu kata bahwa jemaat tidak izin laku doa fajr di masjid istiqlalberita itu jadi viral di twitter dengan hashtag istiqlal yang digemboksejumlah foto tunjuk jumlah orang yang doa di jemaat di sisi jalan

berita: Who doesn't know catfish, this fish is a favorite for many people because it has a delicious taste and has a soft meat texture, but it turns out that catfish is the dirtiest fish, one mouthful contains three thousand cancer cells. Is that true? Catfish The Dirtiest Fish, One Mouth contains Three Thousand Cancer Cells, Here's the Explanation Catfish is one of the favorite food menus and even in every food stall this menu easy is always available because the price is quite cheap and delicious can be the main attraction for this one fish. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is that? The following is an explanation: The catfish pond is very dirty and is surrounded by chicken coops and pigs. According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong, who admitted that he had supplied a lot of catfish to markets and restaurants on the side of the road in Hainan province, precisely in Haikou, which he harvested 3 once a month. Due to the many complaints from the community, journalists searched about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places because these fish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pigs, even this fish can also consume human waste. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. That's some information about catfish in China, but in Indonesia this fish has been cultivated well by catfish farmers and they use pellets as food instead of using waste which is very dangerous for the health of the human body. So that consuming catfish in Indonesia there is no need to doubt its cleanliness, but as wise consumers we must remain vigilant about the content of this fish and do not need to consume it in large quantities on a regular basis because it can interfere with our health.
berita_id: Siapa yang tidak tahu ikan lele, ikan ini adalah favorit bagi banyak orang karena memiliki rasa yang lezat dan memiliki tekstur daging yang lembut, tetapi ternyata ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor, satu suapan berisi tiga ribu sel kanker.Apakah itu benar?Catfish ikan paling kotor, satu mulut berisi tiga ribu sel kanker, inilah penjelasannya Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit dan bahkan di setiap kios makanan menu ini dengan mudah selalu tersedia karena harganya cukup murah dan lezat dapat menjadi daya tarik utama untuk ikan yang satu ini.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Kenapa begitu?Berikut ini adalah penjelasan: kolam ikan lele sangat kotor dan dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi.Menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-Hong, yang mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele ke pasar dan restoran di sisi jalan di provinsi Helah, tepatnya di haikou, yang ia panen 3 sebulan sekali.Karena banyak keluhan dari masyarakat, jurnalis mencari tentang ikan dari perikanan dan departemen kelautan setempat.Para wartawan mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan mereka sebelum hasil tes keluar.Catfish adalah ikan yang mengkonsumsi limbah ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor karena ikan ini mengkonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan babi, bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah manusia.Jadi ada kemungkinan bahwa dalam tubuh ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Itu beberapa informasi tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi di Indonesia ikan ini telah dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani lele dan mereka menggunakan pelet sebagai makanan alih -alih menggunakan limbah yang sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan tubuh manusia.Sehingga mengkonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia tidak perlu meragukan kebersihannya, tetapi sebagai konsumen yang bijak kita harus tetap waspada tentang kandungan ikan ini dan tidak perlu mengkonsumsinya secara teratur secara teratur karena dapat mengganggu kesehatan kita.

berita: When commemorating the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College, an Alumni named Ananda Sukarlan walked out when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Rasyid Baswedan delivered his speech. This was confirmed by the Press Release from the Canisius 86 Alumni Association received by the Tribune on Monday afternoon (13/11/2017). In a written statement, Ananda Sukarlan, the composer and pianist, stood up and left the venue when Anies as well Baswedan gave a speech. "This Saturday, November 11, the governor of Jakarta, Anies Baswedan. When he gave a speech, Ananda Sukarlan stood up from his VIP seat and walked out showing his disapproval of Anies' speech. This action was then followed by hundreds of alumni and other members of the audience. by the audience who stayed, Anies Baswedan left the place. The audience who had walked out also entered the room again," the statement said. The 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College was attended by thousands of Kanisius alumni at Jiexpo Kemayoran, Central Jakarta. When receiving the award, Ananda also had the opportunity to deliver a 10-minute speech. In his speech, Ananda besides thanking him, he also gave criticism to the organizing committee. "You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that are contrary to what we have been taught. Although you may have to invite him because of his position, but next time we have to look at the person as well. He got his position in ways that are not in accordance with the values -Canisius' values. I'm not talking about politics, this is a matter of conscience and human values," he said in the written statement. After getting off the stage, Ananda was greeted and praised by the nominees for the award, including former minister Ir. Sarwono Kusumaatmaja and Father E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Principal of Kanisius High School. The agenda was also attended by alumni of this school, which has consistently been male only, in Menteng Raya for the first time giving the Canisius Awards to 5 alumni from various generations. These 5 alumni were screened from the 95 finalists who became candidates. They are Ananda Sukarlan (composer & pianist), Derianto Kusuma (founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma)
berita_id: Ketika memperingati peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College, seorang alumni bernama Ananda Sukarlan berjalan keluar ketika Gubernur Dki Jakarta Anies Rasyid Baswedan menyampaikan pidatonya.Ini dikonfirmasi oleh siaran pers dari Asosiasi Alumni Canisius 86 yang diterima oleh Tribune pada Senin sore (13/11/2017).Dalam sebuah pernyataan tertulis, Ananda Sukarlan, komposer dan pianis, berdiri dan meninggalkan venue ketika Anies juga Baswedan memberikan pidato."Sabtu ini, 11 November, gubernur Jakarta, Anies Baswedan. Ketika dia memberikan pidato, Ananda Sukarlan berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar menunjukkan ketidaksetujuannya terhadap pidato anies. Tindakan ini kemudian diikuti oleh ratusan alumni dan anggota audiensi yang berjalan oleh penonton. Oleh penonton yang tinggal, Anies Baswedan, meninggalkan tempat itu. Tempat itu.Peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College dihadiri oleh ribuan alumni Kanisius di Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta Tengah.Saat menerima penghargaan, Ananda juga memiliki kesempatan untuk menyampaikan pidato 10 menit.Dalam pidatonya, Ananda selain berterima kasih padanya, ia juga memberi kritik kepada komite pengorganisasian."Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang telah kami ajarkan. Meskipun Anda mungkin harus mengundangnya karena posisinya, tetapi lain kali kita harus melihat orang itu juga. Dia mendapatkan posisinya dengan cara yang tidak sesuai dengan nilai -nilai -Nilai -nilai yang ditulis.Setelah turun dari panggung, Ananda disambut dan dipuji oleh nominasi untuk penghargaan tersebut, termasuk mantan Menteri IR.Sarwono Kusumaatmaja dan Pastor E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Kepala Sekolah Menengah Kanisius.Agenda ini juga dihadiri oleh alumni sekolah ini, yang secara konsisten hanya laki -laki, di Menteng Raya untuk pertama kalinya memberikan penghargaan Canisius kepada 5 alumni dari berbagai generasi.5 alumni ini disaring dari 95 finalis yang menjadi kandidat.Mereka adalah Ananda Sukarlan (Komposer & Pianis), DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (Jesuit Figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (Pemimpin Pramuka) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma)

berita: Jakarta, There is news circulating in cyberspace that there is a toothbrush product that uses pig bristles. It is mentioned that Muslim consumers should be careful of brushes with the words 'bristle' written on the packaging because it means sea urchin. Is this news true? The Institute for the Study of Food, Drugs and Cosmetics, the Indonesian Ulema Council (LPPOM MUI) on its official website, tries to explain that bristle does not always mean sea urchin. The meaning of the word bristle in general can mean all hair or stiff fibers. "Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is fibers or stiff pine leaves that can be called bristle," wrote LPPOM MUI quoted on Tuesday (1/11/2016). "One of the information that can be seen as a sign that a brush or brush comes from sea urchins is that it is written as a product name, for example 'Boar Bristle Brush'. Boar is an English term for wild boar or wild boar. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles ," continued LPPOM MUI. drg Eva Fauziah from the Indonesian Pediatric Dentist Association (IDGAI) commented that the toothbrush in the market generally uses nylon bristles. Nylon as it is known is a synthetic fiber made from plastic. "Toothbrush bristles are usually made of nylon," said drg Eva when detikHealth met. If someone is suspicious of a toothbrush product, there are ways that can be done to determine whether the brush is made of animal hair or other materials. Simply burn the tip of the brush and smell if it smells like burning hair or horns. "If it smells like burning hair or horns, it's better to leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber don't give off a distinctive smell explain like that when burned," closed LPPOM MUI. In the broadcast circulating through WhatsApp groups and social media, a picture of the back of the toothbrush product packaging is included. However, it seems that the product is not marketed for the Indonesian market. The broadcaster circled the word bristles in the toothbrush packaging while explaining its meaning.
berita_id: Jakarta, ada berita yang beredar di dunia maya bahwa ada produk sikat gigi yang menggunakan bulu babi.Disebutkan bahwa konsumen Muslim harus berhati -hati dengan sikat dengan kata -kata 'bulu' yang ditulis pada kemasan karena itu berarti landak laut.Apakah berita ini benar?Institut untuk studi tentang makanan, obat -obatan dan kosmetik, Dewan Ulama Indonesia (LPPOM MUI) di situs web resminya, mencoba menjelaskan bahwa Bristle tidak selalu berarti landak laut.Arti kata bulu secara umum dapat berarti semua rambut atau serat kaku."Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu. Contoh lain adalah serat atau daun pinus kaku yang dapat disebut bristle," tulis LPPOM MUI yang dikutip pada hari Selasa (1/11/2016)."Salah satu informasi yang dapat dilihat sebagai tanda bahwa kuas atau kuas berasal dari landak laut adalah bahwa itu ditulis sebagai nama produk, misalnya 'Babi Belas Bulu'. Boar adalah istilah bahasa Inggris untuk babi hutan atau babi hutan. Ini berarti bahwa produk adalah sikat yang menggunakan bulu babi liar," lanjut LPPOM MUI.DRG Eva Fauziah dari Asosiasi Dokter Gigi Anak Indonesia (IDGAI) berkomentar bahwa sikat gigi di pasar umumnya menggunakan bulu nilon.Nylon seperti yang diketahui adalah serat sintetis yang terbuat dari plastik."Bulu sikat gigi biasanya terbuat dari nilon," kata Drg Eva ketika Detikhealth bertemu.Jika seseorang curiga terhadap produk sikat gigi, ada cara yang dapat dilakukan untuk menentukan apakah sikat terbuat dari rambut hewani atau bahan lainnya.Cukup bakar ujung sikat dan bau jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar."Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik membiarkannya sendiri. Bahan -bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak mengeluarkan bau yang khas menjelaskan seperti itu ketika dibakar," tutup LPPOM MUI.Dalam siaran yang beredar melalui grup WhatsApp dan media sosial, gambar bagian belakang kemasan produk sikat gigi disertakan.Namun, tampaknya produk tersebut tidak dipasarkan untuk pasar Indonesia.Penyiar itu mengelilingi kata bulu -bulu dalam kemasan sikat gigi sambil menjelaskan maknanya.

berita: Basically there is no food that carries cancer cells, world cancer experts agree that it is healthy cells in the body that turn into cancer cells because of the effects of conditions in the body due to the influence of a number of things such as foods that have carcinogenic effects. Changes occur gradually, usually starting from the destruction of healthy cells which then progress to the regeneration of aberrant cells. So it is not correct to say that catfish carry cancer cells in the body. Even if catfish has the effect of increasing the risk of cancer, it is most likely because there is a carcinogenic effect carried by fish. Some suspicions come from how catfish live, both in the wild and in rearing ponds. Because catfish have excellent resistance to a dirty environment, even a polluted environment. They are sometimes reared with waste food which is feared to be a carrier of carcinogenic effects in fish meat. One source that later became viral was the news of America's rejection of catfish from China. Unfortunately the news that arrived in Indonesia did not present the actual news. While in Indonesia hap the news raised about the pattern of rearing by feeding pig manure, actually according to a source abcnews.go.com, the United States' refusal was based on field findings that catfish from China contained anti-fungal, anti-bacterial and types of chlorine compounds which were considered dangerous and natural. carcinogen. This actually indicates that fisheries in China are so modern that they put a number of chemical compounds in their ponds in inappropriate amounts. It also invalidates the information that catfish from China were rejected as a result of being fed pig dung.
berita_id: Pada dasarnya tidak ada makanan yang membawa sel kanker, para ahli kanker dunia sepakat bahwa sel -sel sehat dalam tubuh yang berubah menjadi sel kanker karena efek kondisi dalam tubuh karena pengaruh sejumlah hal seperti makanan yang memiliki efek karsinogenik.Perubahan terjadi secara bertahap, biasanya mulai dari penghancuran sel -sel sehat yang kemudian berkembang ke regenerasi sel yang menyimpang.Jadi tidak benar untuk mengatakan bahwa ikan lele membawa sel kanker dalam tubuh.Bahkan jika ikan lele memiliki efek meningkatkan risiko kanker, kemungkinan besar karena ada efek karsinogenik yang dibawa oleh ikan.Beberapa kecurigaan berasal dari bagaimana ikan lele hidup, baik di alam liar maupun di kolam pemeliharaan.Karena ikan lele memiliki ketahanan yang sangat baik terhadap lingkungan yang kotor, bahkan lingkungan yang tercemar.Mereka kadang -kadang dibesarkan dengan makanan limbah yang ditakuti menjadi pembawa efek karsinogenik pada daging ikan.Salah satu sumber yang kemudian menjadi viral adalah berita tentang penolakan Amerika terhadap ikan lele dari Cina.Sayangnya berita yang tiba di Indonesia tidak memberikan berita yang sebenarnya.Sementara di Indonesia Hap berita yang diangkat tentang pola pemeliharaan dengan memberi makan pupuk babi, sebenarnya menurut sumber abcnews.go.com, penolakan Amerika Serikat didasarkan pada temuan lapangan bahwa ikan lele dari Cina mengandung anti-jamur, anti-bakteri dan jenis senyawa klorin yang dianggap berbahaya dan alami.karsinogen.Ini sebenarnya menunjukkan bahwa perikanan di Cina sangat modern sehingga mereka menempatkan sejumlah senyawa kimia di kolam mereka dalam jumlah yang tidak pantas.Ini juga membatalkan informasi bahwa ikan lele dari Cina ditolak sebagai akibat dari diberi makan kotoran babi.

berita: Jakarta (ANTARA News) - Spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Arrmanatha Nasir said that his party was conducting an internal inspection regarding the burning of reog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. "Essentially, there has been an official statement (statement) from the Consulate General in Davao regarding the reog issue and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs also has an internal process to confirm it because the item is an asset of a state agency," said Arrmanatha Nasir in Jakarta, Sunday. On 20 October 2015, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao issued an official statement that the destruction of Ponorogo reog by burning was carried out because its condition had been damaged and eaten by termites. However, the photos that circulated virally and have even been distributed by local online media Bitung News, show that there was a certain ritual before the burning. One of the photos also shows that before being burned, the Ponorogo reog was stored in a glass cabinet and appeared to be in good condition. Apart from the reog, in another photo, it appears that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao removed the dragon ornaments on the gamelan set and then also burned it. Related to this, Arrmanatha conveyed that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs would carry out inspections according to the processes in accordance with existing standards. " Periodically there are internal inspections , " he said . Domestic reactions related to the burning of Reog Ponorogo at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, were conveyed by the Jabodetabek Reog Community. The community sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, asking for clarification on information on the burning of reog art instruments by Indonesian Consulate General officials. electrocution Secretary General of the Jabodetabek Reog Association, Agus Setiyoko, said that his party hoped that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao would not only provide a detailed explanation of the burning of reog, but also broadcast clarifications on the burning of reog art objects in a number of national media.
berita_id: JAKARTA (Antara News) - Juru bicara untuk Kementerian Luar Negeri Arrmanatha Nasir mengatakan bahwa partainya sedang melakukan inspeksi internal mengenai pembakaran reog di konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao, Filipina."Pada dasarnya, telah ada pernyataan resmi (pernyataan) dari konsulat jenderal di Davao mengenai masalah reog dan Kementerian Luar Negeri juga memiliki proses internal untuk mengkonfirmasinya karena barang tersebut merupakan aset dari agen negara," kata Arrmanatha Nasir di Jakarta, Minggu.Pada tanggal 20 Oktober 2015, konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao mengeluarkan pernyataan resmi bahwa penghancuran Ponorogo Reog dengan pembakaran dilakukan karena kondisinya telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Namun, foto -foto yang beredar secara viral dan bahkan telah didistribusikan oleh media online Bitung News, menunjukkan bahwa ada ritual tertentu sebelum pembakaran.Salah satu foto juga menunjukkan bahwa sebelum dibakar, Ponorogo Reog disimpan dalam lemari kaca dan tampak dalam kondisi baik.Terlepas dari reog, di foto lain, tampaknya konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao menghapus ornamen naga pada set gamelan dan kemudian juga membakarnya.Terkait dengan ini, Arrmanatha menyampaikan bahwa Kementerian Luar Negeri akan melakukan inspeksi sesuai dengan proses sesuai dengan standar yang ada."Secara berkala ada inspeksi internal," katanya.Reaksi domestik yang berkaitan dengan pembakaran Ponorogo Reog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, disampaikan oleh komunitas Reog Jabodetabek.Komunitas mengirim surat resmi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, meminta klarifikasi tentang informasi tentang pembakaran instrumen seni reog oleh pejabat umum konsulat Indonesia.Sekretaris Jenderal Elektrokution dari Asosiasi Reog Jabodetabek, Agus Setiyoko, mengatakan bahwa partainya berharap bahwa konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao tidak hanya akan memberikan penjelasan terperinci tentang pembakaran reog, tetapi juga menyiarkan klarifikasi tentang pembakaran objek seni reog di sejumlah media nasional.

berita: Catfish is one type of fish that is a favorite in every dish on the food menu, it tastes good and the texture of the meat is soft, making this fish much recommended in culinary tours. But who would have thought that behind the delicious taste, it turns out that catfish has surprising facts. Catfish turns out to be the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. In one bite, catfish contains three thousand cancer cells. Really? The catfish pond is very dirty and surrounded by chicken coops and pigs. A catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish to roadside markets and restaurants in Hainan province, to be precise in Haikou, which he harvests every 3 months. The number of complaints from the community made journalists try to find out about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. They took pond samples from 7 ponds that housed the catfish. It turned out that the seven ponds were surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there were many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places, by consuming animal waste such as chicken, cow and pig waste and even human waste. angle So it is possible catfish contains three thousand cancer cells that are harmful to the human body. Those are some facts about catfish in China, but conditions in China are different from those in Indonesia. In Indonesia, this fish is cultivated well by catfish farmers and for catfish food they do not use waste but pellets which are not harmful to health. So there is no need to hesitate to consume catfish in Indonesia, because cleanliness is guaranteed. Apart from all that, the health of consuming catfish depends on where the catfish breeds and what kind of food is given in cultivating it. Because it turns out that catfish also has substances that are beneficial to health, if the fish is cultivated properly. Here are 4 benefits of catfish: Healthy heart and brain Catfish contains omega-3 and omega-6 which are usually contained in expensive fish such as cod and salmon. The content of omega-3 and omega-6 can help heart and brain health activities, and it turns out that a serving of catfish contains 220 mg of omega-3 and 875 mg of omega-6. Contains protein with good quality In a serving of catfish contains 15.6 grams of protein which is very useful in the formation of muscle tissue and strengthens the immune system. Contains vitamin B-12 A serving of catfish contains vitamin B-12, which is about 40% of the body's needs. This vitamin is useful in helping to break down food into energy for the body, so consuming these foods can make the body stronger. Contains DHA Pregnant women are advised to eat catfish because this fish contains DHA which is good for the formation of the baby's nerves and also this fish has a very low mercury content so it is safe for consumption.
berita_id: Catfish adalah salah satu jenis ikan yang menjadi favorit di setiap hidangan di menu makanan, rasanya enak dan tekstur dagingnya lunak, membuat ikan ini sangat direkomendasikan dalam tur kuliner.Tetapi siapa yang akan berpikir bahwa di balik selera yang lezat, ternyata ikan lele memiliki fakta yang mengejutkan.Lele ternyata adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Dalam satu gigitan, ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker.Benar-benar?Kolam ikan lele sangat kotor dan dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi.Seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele ke pasar jalan dan restoran di provinsi Hainan, tepatnya di haikou, yang ia panen setiap 3 bulan.Jumlah keluhan dari masyarakat membuat jurnalis mencoba mencari tahu tentang ikan dari perikanan dan departemen kelautan setempat.Mereka mengambil sampel kolam dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Ternyata ketujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sementara di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan mereka sebelum hasil tes keluar.Catfish adalah ikan yang mengkonsumsi limbah ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor, dengan mengonsumsi limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi dan limbah babi dan bahkan limbah manusia.Sudut sehingga mungkin ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Itu adalah beberapa fakta tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi kondisi di Cina berbeda dari yang ada di Indonesia.Di Indonesia, ikan ini dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani ikan lele dan untuk makanan lele mereka tidak menggunakan limbah tetapi pelet yang tidak berbahaya bagi kesehatan.Jadi tidak perlu ragu -ragu untuk mengonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia, karena kebersihan dijamin.Terlepas dari semua itu, kesehatan mengonsumsi ikan lele tergantung pada di mana ikan lele berkembang biak dan jenis makanan apa yang diberikan dalam menanamnya.Karena ternyata ikan lele juga memiliki zat yang bermanfaat bagi kesehatan, jika ikan dibudidayakan dengan benar.Berikut adalah 4 manfaat ikan lele: Lelyal jantung dan otak yang sehat mengandung omega-3 dan omega-6 yang biasanya terkandung dalam ikan mahal seperti cod dan salmon.Isi omega-3 dan omega-6 dapat membantu kegiatan kesehatan jantung dan otak, dan ternyata sekumpulan ikan lele mengandung 220 mg omega-3 dan 875 mg omega-6.Mengandung protein dengan kualitas yang baik dalam porsi ikan lele mengandung 15,6 gram protein yang sangat berguna dalam pembentukan jaringan otot dan memperkuat sistem kekebalan tubuh.Mengandung vitamin B-12 Porsi ikan lele mengandung vitamin B-12, yang merupakan sekitar 40% dari kebutuhan tubuh.Vitamin ini berguna dalam membantu memecah makanan menjadi energi bagi tubuh, sehingga mengonsumsi makanan ini dapat membuat tubuh lebih kuat.Berisi wanita hamil DHA disarankan untuk makan lele karena ikan ini mengandung DHA yang baik untuk pembentukan saraf bayi dan juga ikan ini memiliki kandungan merkuri yang sangat rendah sehingga aman untuk dikonsumsi.
