berita: In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes made of some boar bristles until the MUI issued a fatwa that it is forbidden to use a pig bristle brush, but recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has emerged. Info for you Muslims to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use ingredients from non-halal. Come on, check the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair in other words Pig Fur! So check your toothbrush package again when you buy it. Similarly on the brush (bread spreader), Generally noted "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". "What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Bristle? Steps to check: Watch the wrap, if it's made of bristles, then it's made of sea urchin. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like the smell of burning hair, it means it's from sea urchins. However, if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. Possibility of using the forbidden: Worship is not accepted, prayer is not accepted, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we use various types of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint homes, grease cake tins, to smear food. Such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, as well as a variety of grilled or grilled meat and seafood. While the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at a salon or barbershop, cleaning clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know, what do the brushes & brushes you use come from? Most likely it is FROM PIGS! Brushes supplied in Indonesia usually come from China. Imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars that have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of clear sea urchins is HARAM. No in all probability matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption as well as for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, SUCH AS MARKETS, PAINTING TOOLS SHOP, BUILDING MATERIALS STORE, MAKE UP TOOLS & SALON SHOP, ONLINE STORE, ETC. ARE YOU FAMILIAR WITH THE MULTIPLE FORMS BELOW? THERE ARE PAINTING BRUSH, WALL PAINT BRUSH, MAKE UP BRUSH, HAIR BRUSH, BARBER/BARBER BRUSH, CLOTHING BRUSH, ETC. BEWARE! TIPS AVOID USE BRUSHS AND BONES BRUSHS: 1. USE 100% SYNTHETIC BRUSH & BRUSH, SUCH AS NYLON. There are wall paint brushes and feeding brushes, which are slightly more expensive. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. USE OTHER ALTERNATIVES BUT THE BRUSH. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for makeup, and knives & spatulas for greasing food. 3. BEWARE OF FOOD THAT THE PROCESS OF COOKING AND CLEANING Utensils USING A PIG BRUSH. 4. CHARACTERISTICS OF PIG BRUSH BRUSH, WHEN BURNED WILL GIVE A SPECIFIC OTHER LIKE ROCKED MEAT. 5. USUALLY PIG BRUSH BRUSHS SOLD IN WHITE & BLACK COLORS. However, producers may process sea urchins by bleaching them and then coloring them, so that they look like other animal hairs. (AND) Reference: Reality in the field & some literature on the internet. Please share this information with your family and friends so that more people will read it so that they are free from products that are not halal…hopefully it will be useful…
berita_id: Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi sampai MUI mengeluarkan fatwa yang dilarang menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul.Info untuk Anda Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan-bahan dari non-halal.Ayo, periksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi dengan kata lain bulu babi!Jadi periksa paket sikat gigi Anda lagi saat Anda membelinya.Demikian pula pada sikat (penyebar roti), umumnya mencatat "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Apa bulu sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari? Bulu plastik atau babi? Langkah -langkah untuk memeriksa: Perhatikan bungkusnya, jika terbuat dari bulu, maka itu terbuat dari landak laut. Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti bau rambut yang terbakar, itu berarti tidak ada yang aman.Diterima, dan neraka lebih layak (Hadis).Seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, serta berbagai daging panggang atau makanan laut.Sementara sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, membersihkan pakaian, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda, dari mana kuas & kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar itu dari babi!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia biasanya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor diproduksi menggunakan landak laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut yang jernih adalah Haram.Tidak ada probabilitas apa pun yang kecil, materi dari babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi serta untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah sikat rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, alat make up & toko salon, toko online, dll.Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah ini?Ada kuas lukisan, sikat cat dinding, kuas make up, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur/tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll.AWAS!Tips Hindari menggunakan kuas dan tulang sikat: 1. Gunakan sikat & sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Ada kuas cat dinding dan sikat makan, yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif lain kecuali kuas.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, dan pisau & spatula untuk makanan berminyak.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang proses memasak dan membersihkan peralatan menggunakan sikat babi.4. Karakteristik sikat sikat babi, ketika dibakar akan memberikan daging guncang lainnya seperti lainnya.5. Biasanya sikat sikat babi dijual dalam warna putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkannya dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, sehingga mereka terlihat seperti rambut binatang lainnya.(Dan) referensi: Realitas di lapangan & beberapa literatur di internet.Silakan bagikan informasi ini dengan keluarga dan teman -teman Anda sehingga lebih banyak orang akan membacanya sehingga mereka bebas dari produk yang tidak halal ... semoga akan berguna ...

berita: DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan regrets the invitation to uninstall Traveloka, which was previously busy milling about on Twitter timeline. The invitation to uninstall Traveloka was triggered by the pianist's walk out action Ananda Sukarlan when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. "Well, I think it's like this. We respect people with views. Respect different people. No need to uninstall and others," Anies said at the DKI Jakarta DPRD Building According to Anies, the Traveloka application has been providing benefits to society. That invitation shouldn't be arise only because of differences of opinion. "Traveloka also provides benefits for many residents. After all, it is a service that has great benefits for many people. So let's get used to different views in a healthy way respect each other without having to carry out punishments like that. So there is no need to uninstall everything," said Anies. Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk-out action when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan make a speech. The walk out took place at the 90th anniversary event Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on the information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders is present at the same time Traveloka CTO Derianto Kusuma greeted and congratulated to Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to carry out a boycott of Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. But it can be ascertained that the news is just a hoax or not true. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that the founder and Traveloka CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Traveloka is proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from the alumni of Canisius. However, he was unable to attend because atomic number  he was on a business trip that had been planned a few months in advance. So if you say Pak Deri is there and it is called providing support (to Ananda), he was not there," he said. "We state that Traveloka is a company based on technology founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders." he continued.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menyesali undangan untuk menghapus instalan Traveloka, yang sebelumnya sibuk berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Undangan untuk menghapus instalasi Traveloka dipicu oleh aksi walk out pianis Ananda Sukarlan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta anies Baswedan memberikan pidato."Yah, saya pikir ini seperti ini. Kami menghormati orang -orang dengan pandangan. Hormati orang yang berbeda. Tidak perlu menghapus instalasi dan yang lainnya," kata Anies di gedung DKI Jakarta DPRD menurut ANIES, aplikasi Traveloka telah memberikan manfaat bagi masyarakat.Undangan itu seharusnya tidak muncul hanya karena perbedaan pendapat."Traveloka juga memberikan manfaat bagi banyak penduduk. Lagi pula, ini adalah layanan yang memiliki manfaat besar bagi banyak orang. Jadi mari kita terbiasa dengan pandangan yang berbeda dengan cara yang sehat satu sama lain tanpa harus melakukan hukuman seperti itu. Jadi tidak perlu menghapus segalanya," kata Anies.Undangan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi Traveloka sedang berseliweran di timeline Twitter.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh aksi pianis Ananda Sukarlan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta anies Baswedan berpidato.Walk Out berlangsung di acara peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri hadir pada saat yang sama Traveloka CTO DERIANTO KUSUMA menyapa dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato Walk Out dan Anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan atas tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk melakukan boikot dari Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Tetapi dapat dipastikan bahwa berita itu hanya tipuan atau tidak benar.Manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri dan Traveloka CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Traveloka bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Canisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena nomor atom ia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya. Jadi jika Anda mengatakan Pak Deri ada di sana dan itu dipanggil memberikan dukungan (kepada Ananda), ia tidak ada di sana," katanya."Kami menyatakan bahwa Traveloka adalah perusahaan yang didasarkan pada teknologi yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri negara Indonesia yang mengedepankan nilai -nilai saling menghormati, toleransi dan inovasi. Nilai -nilai ini selalu diterapkan pada karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan eksternal."Dia melanjutkan.

berita: Pianist and composer Ananda Sukarlan has been constantly criticized by a number of groups for protesting by leaving the event or walking out when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan made a speech in celebration of the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College Jakarta Saturday 11112017 On social media Twitter there is a lot of debate between those who support his attitude and those who make fun of him Musician and politician Erros Djarot even spoke up regretting Ananda Sukarlans attitude Even writings circulating in the name of the clergy Frans Magnis Suseno on social mediaalthough there was no confirmation from Father FransMagnis whether it was really his writing Ananda was invited to attend the event because he received the Canisius Award along with four other Kanisius College alumni who sat in the VIP seats His WO action attracted the attention of other guests and several other alumni even participated KBR journalist Asrul Dwi interviewed Ananda Sukarlan and talked about why he chose to leave the room during Anies Baswedans speech Why did you choose to walk out when Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech I have always disagreed with Anies Baswedans method during the DKI Jakarta Pilkada campaign Also what has he been doing for the past three weeks where whatever the previous Governor of DKI Ahok has been countered So Im not really his pick Then I walked out because I didnt want to hear more of his speech You said that Anies Baswedans integrity was in doubt What does it mean I was taught by my parents and school about the value of difference From elementary to high school I studied at a Catholic school While I myself am Muslim Thats no problem and not exaggerated My good friends are also from any ethnicity and any religion Thats no reason to divide And like my speech we make a difference together to be better Not to divide Do you see Anies Baswedan still doing that Yes you just listen to his speech when he was governor During his inauguration as the Governor of DKI Jakarta Monday October 16 2017 Anies Baswedan delivered a speech one of which touched on the indigenous issue Jakarta is one of the few places in Indonesia that has felt the presence of colonialists in everyday life for centuries The indigenous people were oppressed and defeated by colonialism Now that we are independent its time for us to be the host in our own country Dont let Jakarta be like what is written in the Madura proverb Duck se atellor ajam se ngeremmi incubating We are working hard to win independence we are working hard to repel colonialism You are said to have failed to move on after the election for the new governor of Jakarta Your response Yes I have moved on thats why I dont want to hear his speech Want anything else He was democratically elected and I accepted him as governor But if I had to listen to

berita: The Minister of Communication and Information did not play with the Facebook case yesterday. Namely a data theft case called Cambridge Analytica, where Facebook suffered a data breach due to an error in accessing third-party applications. Reported from CNN Indonesia, the Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, stated that there would be a possibility that Facebook would be blocked the day after tomorrow. This was done based on the latest report regarding the fate of the leaked data of one million Indonesian users from Facebook which was never received by the Minister of Communication and Information. Rudiantara also complained about the quiz application that was still found on the Facebook timeline. Even though he had asked when he met directly with Facebook, to completely block all quiz applications from third parties. At the meeting, Facebook promised to periodically inform the government about the fate of the stolen data of Facebook users in Indonesia. Tumblr is blocked Some of the things that Facebook promised, one of which is to remove and block all quiz applications from third parties, and also provide the main goal of the application makers stealing data from users. The leak of data from Indonesian users is inseparable from the political straight conditions in Indonesia. One of the expert staff from the Minister of Communication and Information, Henri Subiakto said that it was possible that the leaked data had been used in the 2017 Jakarta election yesterday. Facebook has indeed been hit by a fatal scandal for them. As regarding the data theft known as Cambridge Analytica, even Facebook boss Mark Zuckerberg admits it. In addition, Facebook also admitted that they also peeked at the contents of messenger messages, namely their chat applications that can be installed on Android phones. Although indeed the message that was peeked was recognized not for business purposes by Facebook. Facebook in this case uses an automated engine to detect messages sent. For example, in sending an image, Facebook will detect whether there is a possibility of child exploitation in the image.
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi tidak bermain dengan kasus Facebook kemarin.Yaitu kasus pencurian data yang disebut Cambridge Analytica, di mana Facebook menderita pelanggaran data karena kesalahan dalam mengakses aplikasi pihak ketiga.Dilaporkan dari CNN Indonesia, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara, menyatakan bahwa akan ada kemungkinan bahwa Facebook akan diblokir lusa.Ini dilakukan berdasarkan laporan terbaru mengenai nasib data yang bocor dari satu juta pengguna Indonesia dari Facebook yang tidak pernah diterima oleh Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi.Rudiantara juga mengeluh tentang aplikasi kuis yang masih ditemukan di timeline Facebook.Meskipun dia bertanya ketika dia bertemu langsung dengan Facebook, untuk sepenuhnya memblokir semua aplikasi kuis dari pihak ketiga.Pada pertemuan tersebut, Facebook berjanji untuk secara berkala memberi tahu pemerintah tentang nasib data yang dicuri dari pengguna Facebook di Indonesia.Tumblr diblokir beberapa hal yang dijanjikan Facebook, salah satunya adalah untuk menghapus dan memblokir semua aplikasi kuis dari pihak ketiga, dan juga memberikan tujuan utama pembuat aplikasi mencuri data dari pengguna.Kebocoran data dari pengguna Indonesia tidak dapat dipisahkan dari kondisi langsung politik di Indonesia.Salah satu staf ahli dari Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Henri Subiakto mengatakan bahwa ada kemungkinan bahwa data yang bocor telah digunakan dalam pemilihan Jakarta 2017 kemarin.Facebook memang terkena skandal fatal bagi mereka.Mengenai pencurian data yang dikenal sebagai Cambridge Analytica, bahkan bos Facebook Mark Zuckerberg mengakuinya.Selain itu, Facebook juga mengakui bahwa mereka juga mengintip isi pesan messenger, yaitu aplikasi obrolan mereka yang dapat diinstal pada ponsel Android.Meskipun memang pesan yang mengintip diakui bukan untuk tujuan bisnis oleh Facebook.Facebook dalam hal ini menggunakan mesin otomatis untuk mendeteksi pesan yang dikirim.Misalnya, dalam mengirim gambar, Facebook akan mendeteksi apakah ada kemungkinan eksploitasi anak dalam gambar.

berita: Medan 13/02/2017, Responding to news in several print and online media about the circulation of Candy Dot which is suspected to contain drugs and other hazardous materials which was first discovered in Surabaya - East Java, so that it made the public nervous, especially those who have small children. In response to this, BB Pom Medan in collaboration with the North Sumatra BNN and feel the District / City Health Office carried out field supervision and from the results of the supervision that the bonbon dot was already circulating in several regions / districts in the North Sumatra region. Labfor Medan Branch has conducted an examination by taking samples from Langkat consisting of BB 1: Spray Candy, BB2: Candy Dot and BB3: White Powder, after being examined with GCMS and FTIR instruments, negative results were obtained for narcotics and psychotropic substances and after it was detected that the bonbon contained D-Glucose Monohydrate, Glucopur, Sweetener, D-Glucose, DL-Phenylalanie, Methy Ester, Methyl Stearate, Palmitic Acid and according to the Medan Branch of Labfor that all substances detected in the bonbon are generally used as sweeteners, not narcotics / psychotropics. . With the results from the Medan Branch Labfor Laboratory, it is appealed to the public not to panic, but so that people are wiser in consuming food products that have a distribution permit, and look at the expiration date so that it does not cause health.
berita_id: Medan 13/02/2017, menanggapi berita di beberapa media cetak dan online tentang sirkulasi permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan dan bahan berbahaya lainnya yang pertama kali ditemukan di Surabaya - Jawa Timur, sehingga membuat publik gugup, terutama mereka yang memiliki anak kecil.Menanggapi hal ini, BB Pom Medan bekerja sama dengan Sumatra Utara BNN dan merasa kantor kesehatan distrik / kota melakukan pengawasan lapangan dan dari hasil pengawasan bahwa titik bonbon sudah beredar di beberapa wilayah / distrik di wilayah Sumatra Utara.Labfor Medan Branch has conducted an examination by taking samples from Langkat consisting of BB 1: Spray Candy, BB2: Candy Dot and BB3: White Powder, after being examined with GCMS and FTIR instruments, negative results were obtained for narcotics and psychotropic substances and after it was detected that the bonbon contained D-Glucose Monohydrate, Glucopur, Sweetener, D-Glucose,DL-phenylalanie, mety ester, metil stearat, asam palmitat dan menurut cabang Medan laboratorium bahwa semua zat yang terdeteksi dalam bonbon umumnya digunakan sebagai pemanis, bukan narkotika / psikotropika..Dengan hasil dari laboratorium Medan Cabang Labfor, ia menarik bagi publik untuk tidak panik, tetapi sehingga orang lebih bijaksana dalam mengonsumsi produk makanan yang memiliki izin distribusi, dan melihat tanggal kedaluwarsa sehingga tidak menyebabkan kesehatan.

berita: Catfish is said to contain 3000 cancer cells. The news circulated on social media. Freshwater fish are also considered the dirtiest fish because they eat all kinds of attractive force dirt. The news made catfish cultivators, catfish pecel stall owners, and freshwater fish connoisseurs offended and devastated. The reason is, catfish is one of the favorite food menus in Indonesia. Almost every food stall, especially in East Java and West Java, always provides this menu. Besides the price is quite cheap, this menu is also delicious, so it becomes a special attraction for consumers. The news that catfish contains 3000 cancer cells first appeared in China. An article that mentions dirty and dirty catfish ads has gone viral on social media. The article mentions that human waste is also used as feed at a catfish farm in China. The article states that catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. This is because catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places. Catfish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chickens, cows and pigs, and humans. This allows catfish to contain 3000 cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. However, catfish connoisseurs are asked not to be influenced by this information. The reason is, catfish advertising in Indonesia is different from China. Catfish in the country are cultivated very well by catfish breeders. They use pellets as their food, not using waste which is very harmful to human health like in China. Poor catfish cultivators, they were offended and very upset by the news. The information that catfish contains 3000 cancer cells is not true, said Head of the East Java Province Fisheries and Marine Service, Heru Tjahjono, Saturday (31/10)
berita_id: Catfish dikatakan mengandung 3000 sel kanker.Berita itu beredar di media sosial.Ikan air tawar juga dianggap sebagai ikan paling kotor karena mereka memakan semua jenis kotoran yang menarik.Berita itu membuat para pembudidaya lele, pemilik kios Pecel lele, dan penikmat ikan air tawar tersinggung dan hancur.Alasannya adalah, ikan lele adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit di Indonesia.Hampir setiap kios makanan, terutama di Jawa Timur dan Jawa Barat, selalu menyediakan menu ini.Selain harganya cukup murah, menu ini juga lezat, sehingga menjadi daya tarik khusus bagi konsumen.Berita bahwa ikan lele berisi 3000 sel kanker pertama kali muncul di Cina.Sebuah artikel yang menyebutkan iklan lele yang kotor dan kotor telah beredar di media sosial.Artikel ini menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan di sebuah peternakan ikan lele di Cina.Artikel tersebut menyatakan bahwa ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Ini karena ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor.Ikan lele mengkonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi dan babi, dan manusia.Ini memungkinkan ikan lele mengandung 3000 sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Namun, penikmat lele diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh informasi ini.Alasannya adalah, iklan lele di Indonesia berbeda dari Cina.Lele di negara ini dibudidayakan dengan sangat baik oleh peternak ikan lele.Mereka menggunakan pelet sebagai makanan mereka, bukan menggunakan limbah yang sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan manusia seperti di Cina.Pengganti ikan lele yang malang, mereka tersinggung dan sangat kesal dengan berita itu.Informasi bahwa ikan lele berisi 3000 sel kanker tidak benar, kata Kepala Perikanan Provinsi Jawa Timur dan Layanan Laut, Heru Tjahjono, Sabtu (31/10)

berita: Social media in Indonesia, especially Twitter, is currently being flooded with calls to uninstall the Traveloka application. According to netizens, the CTO who is also one of the founders of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, is said to have supported the walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan was giving a speech at the Kanisius College school anniversary event. The news angered netizens who said Derianto did not respect Anies and decided to take the Traveloka application off his smartphone. I don't know where this information originally circulated, because it turned out to be just a hoax. Traveloka has confirmed that Derianto was not present at the 90th anniversary of Kanisius on Saturday (11/11). It is known that Derianto was indeed invited to attend the event because he received an award as one of the outstanding alumni of Kanisius. "We are also proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Alumni Kanisius. However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned several months earlier," Traveloka explained in an official statement to VIVA via email, Tuesday 14 November 2017. This means that what is rumored on social media about Derianto's support for the walk out is not true. Regarding the details of the action, according to an official statement from Kolose Kanisius, it was stated that when Anies gave a speech, one of the alumni viva voce who is also a well-known pianist Ananda Sukarlan decided to stand up from his VIP seat and walk out. This action was then followed by hundreds of alumni and other invited guests who attended. After Anies finished giving his speech and left the place, the people who had walked out earlier returned to the room. Ananda Sukarlan himself became another alumnus who received an award in this event because he was considered to have excelled in the field of music. This is evidence for the umpteenth time that hoaxes have succeeded in influencing the wider community in a short time. Without correct facts and information, people still easily believe what is trending topic on social media without searching for the truth first.
berita_id: Media sosial di Indonesia, terutama Twitter, saat ini dibanjiri panggilan untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka.Menurut Netizens, CTO yang juga merupakan salah satu pendiri Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, dikatakan telah mendukung perjalanan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato di acara peringatan Sekolah Sekolah Kanisius.Berita itu membuat netizen yang mengatakan Deriianto tidak menghormati Anies dan memutuskan untuk mengambil aplikasi Traveloka dari ponsel cerdasnya.Saya tidak tahu di mana informasi ini awalnya beredar, karena ternyata hanya tipuan.Traveloka telah mengkonfirmasi bahwa DeRianto tidak hadir pada peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius pada hari Sabtu (11/11).Diketahui bahwa DeRianto memang diundang untuk menghadiri acara tersebut karena ia menerima penghargaan sebagai salah satu alumni Kanisius yang luar biasa."Kami juga bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari alumni Kanisius. Namun, ia tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," Traveloka menjelaskan dalam pernyataan resmi kepada Viva melalui email, Selasa 14 November 2017. Ini berarti bahwa apa yang dirumuskan di media sosial tentang Derianto untuk Derianto for the Derianto Foring.Mengenai rincian tindakan tersebut, menurut pernyataan resmi dari Kolose Kanisius, dinyatakan bahwa ketika Anies memberikan pidato, salah satu alumni Viva Voce yang juga seorang pianis terkenal Ananda Sukarlan memutuskan untuk berdiri dari kursi VIP-nya dan berjalan keluar.Tindakan ini kemudian diikuti oleh ratusan alumni dan tamu undangan lainnya yang hadir.Setelah Anies selesai memberikan pidatonya dan meninggalkan tempat itu, orang -orang yang telah keluar sebelumnya kembali ke kamar.Ananda Sukarlan sendiri menjadi alumni lain yang menerima penghargaan dalam acara ini karena ia dianggap unggul di bidang musik.Ini adalah bukti untuk kesekian kalinya bahwa tipuan telah berhasil mempengaruhi komunitas yang lebih luas dalam waktu singkat.Tanpa fakta dan informasi yang benar, orang masih mudah percaya apa yang menjadi topik tren di media sosial tanpa mencari kebenaran terlebih dahulu.

berita: There are several myths about preventing stroke. One of them is sticking a needle. Dr. Frandy Susatia SpS said that this myth is something that can actually harm oneself. Moreover, if those who do it also suffer from diabetes. It is not true that to prevent stroke by inserting a needle. It's just a myth, he said in Jakarta recently. In addition to sticking a needle, another myth is flushing the skin when it's hot. But again, the doctor who practices at the Siloam Kebon Jeruk Hospital denied it. Not true. If it's hot, the blood vessels will spread, but it will be normal again when the accession heat is reduced. Only fainted, but not stroke, because the blood vessels are uploading, he concluded.
berita_id: Ada beberapa mitos tentang mencegah stroke.Salah satunya adalah menempelkan jarum.Frandy Susatia SPS mengatakan bahwa mitos ini adalah sesuatu yang benar -benar dapat membahayakan diri sendiri.Selain itu, jika mereka yang melakukannya juga menderita diabetes.Tidak benar untuk mencegah stroke dengan memasukkan jarum.Itu hanya mitos, katanya di Jakarta baru -baru ini.Selain menempelkan jarum, mitos lain adalah menyiram kulit saat panas.Tetapi sekali lagi, Dokter yang berlatih di Rumah Sakit Siloam Kebon Jeruk membantahnya.Tidak benar.Jika panas, pembuluh darah akan menyebar, tetapi akan normal lagi ketika panas aksesi berkurang.Hanya pingsan, tetapi tidak stroke, karena pembuluh darah mengunggah, ia menyimpulkan.

berita: Director General of Applications and Information at the Ministry of Communication and Information (Dirjen Aptika Kemkominfo) Samuel Abrijani Pangerapan said Facebook plans to open an office in Indonesia. "Besides opening an office, it will be closer to its users, and the service will be faster," said Samuel after a meeting with Facebook Asia Pacific representatives in Jakarta, Wednesday (2/8/2017). Samuel explained that Facebook plans to open an office in the form of a PT (Limited Company) and will be inaugurated in August 2017. In the meeting, according to Samuel, Facebook was represented by Director Head of Trust and Safet Asia Pacific Jeff Wu and Head of Public Policy Southeast Asia Alvin Tan. The meeting was a follow-up to a meeting with OTT (internet-based service applications) in order to improve the handling of negative content. Furthermore, Samuel said, Facebook on that occasion reported an increase in services, including the handling of negative content. The government expects the service level index (SLI), especially the response to occlude the government, which in 2015-2016 amounted to 49.3 percent can be increased. "If we compare them with others, they are already close to 70 percent, that's what we hope for improvement," he said. On that occasion, Samuel explained, Facebook delivered a geo-blocking feature. Through geo-blocking, Facebook can block access to negative content only in countries where it is prohibited. Thus, content that does not comply with regulations in Indonesia can be blocked specifically in the Indonesian region. Meanwhile, in other countries where it is deemed not to violate the rules, it can still be accessed. He gave an example of pornographic content. "In Indonesia pornography is prohibited and very rigid, so they have to comply with Indonesian regulations because it is prohibited. Maybe in other countries the content is not prohibited so that it can be accessed, while in Indonesia it cannot be accessed," he said.
berita_id: Direktur Jenderal Aplikasi dan Informasi di Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi (Dirjen Aptika Kemkominfo) Samuel Abrijani Pangerapan mengatakan Facebook berencana untuk membuka kantor di Indonesia."Selain membuka kantor, itu akan lebih dekat dengan penggunanya, dan layanan ini akan lebih cepat," kata Samuel setelah pertemuan dengan perwakilan Facebook Asia Pasifik di Jakarta, Rabu (2/8/2017).Samuel menjelaskan bahwa Facebook berencana untuk membuka kantor dalam bentuk PT (perusahaan terbatas) dan akan diresmikan pada Agustus 2017. Dalam pertemuan tersebut, menurut Samuel, Facebook diwakili oleh Direktur Kepala Trust dan Safet Asia Pasifik Jeff Wu dan kepala kebijakan publik Asia Tenggara Asia Alvin Tan.Pertemuan tersebut merupakan tindak lanjut dari pertemuan dengan OTT (aplikasi layanan berbasis internet) untuk meningkatkan penanganan konten negatif.Selain itu, Samuel mengatakan, Facebook pada kesempatan itu melaporkan peningkatan layanan, termasuk penanganan konten negatif.Pemerintah mengharapkan Indeks Level Layanan (SLI), terutama respons terhadap pemerintah, yang pada 2015-2016 berjumlah 49,3 persen dapat ditingkatkan."Jika kita membandingkannya dengan orang lain, mereka sudah mendekati 70 persen, itulah yang kami harapkan untuk perbaikan," katanya.Pada kesempatan itu, Samuel menjelaskan, Facebook menyampaikan fitur geo-blocking.Melalui geo-blocking, Facebook dapat memblokir akses ke konten negatif hanya di negara-negara di mana ia dilarang.Dengan demikian, konten yang tidak mematuhi peraturan di Indonesia dapat diblokir secara khusus di wilayah Indonesia.Sementara itu, di negara -negara lain di mana dianggap tidak melanggar aturan, itu masih dapat diakses.Dia memberi contoh konten pornografi."Di Indonesia, pornografi dilarang dan sangat kaku, jadi mereka harus mematuhi peraturan Indonesia karena dilarang. Mungkin di negara lain konten tidak dilarang sehingga dapat diakses, sedangkan di Indonesia tidak dapat diakses," katanya.

berita: Careful! Now circulating a toothbrush made of pig bristles. The way to find it is to look on the toothbrush package to see if it says “China Bristles” or “Bristles”. China Bristles is another name for sea urchins and is produced mostly by the Chinese region of China. We must know this because it is based on Imam Syafii's opinion that brushes made of sea urchins are unclean. Pig bristles are indeed the choice of toothbrush manufacturers because the price of the material is cheaper than synthetic bristles. Manufacturers only have to collect, clean and cut them. China is indeed a place that stocks a lot of pork skins because pork is considered halal by its people for consumption. It's not just a toothbrush that we have to watch out for, but a paint brush or a abound brush for greasing cakes must also be a concern for us as Muslims. A real example is the case of the brush brand Eterna which has been tested by LPPOM and the results are positive using sea urchins. Apart from looking at the packaging, there is another way to find out, namely by burning it. If the brush or brush smells bad, it's most likely using pig bristles. According to Imam Syafii, brushes made from pig bristles used to paint mosques will make the mosque covered with uncleanness and must be removed immediately. Moreover, if the sea urchin becomes a toothbrush that we use every day. Therefore, be careful and continue to be vigilant against various products that can bring harm to us as Muslims.
berita_id: Hati-hati!Sekarang mengedarkan sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Cara untuk menemukannya adalah dengan melihat paket sikat gigi untuk melihat apakah dikatakan "China Bristles" atau "bulu". Bulu Cina adalah nama lain untuk landak laut dan sebagian besar diproduksi oleh wilayah Cina di Tiongkok.Kita harus mengetahui hal ini karena didasarkan pada pendapat Imam Syafii bahwa kuas yang terbuat dari landak laut adalah najis.Babi babi memang merupakan pilihan produsen sikat gigi karena harga bahan lebih murah daripada bulu sintetis.Produsen hanya perlu mengumpulkan, membersihkan, dan memotongnya.China memang merupakan tempat yang menyediakan banyak kulit babi karena babi dianggap halal oleh orang -orangnya untuk dikonsumsi.Bukan hanya sikat gigi yang harus kita waspadai, tetapi sikat cat atau kuas yang berlimpah untuk kue yang berminyak juga harus menjadi perhatian bagi kita sebagai Muslim.Contoh nyata adalah kasus Brush Brand ETERNA yang telah diuji oleh LPPOM dan hasilnya positif menggunakan bulu babi.Selain melihat kemasannya, ada cara lain untuk mengetahuinya, yaitu dengan membakarnya.Jika kuas atau kuas berbau tidak enak, kemungkinan besar menggunakan bulu babi.Menurut Imam Syafii, kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi yang digunakan untuk melukis masjid akan membuat masjid ditutupi dengan kenajisan dan harus segera dihapus.Selain itu, jika landak laut menjadi sikat gigi yang kami gunakan setiap hari.Oleh karena itu, hati -hati dan terus waspada terhadap berbagai produk yang dapat membahayakan kita sebagai Muslim.

berita: In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to make up, paint, clean dust, paint the house, grease cake pans, to smear food such as grilled masses chicken, bread, cakes, and various baked or grilled meats and seafood. when combing hair, cleaning hair in salons or barbershops, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors Do you know what brushes and brushes you use come from? Most likely from sea urchins! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than other animal hairs, such as squirrels, goats, civets, camels, and dogs. January – June 2001 period, Indonesia imported 282,983 tons of Boar Bristle and Pig or Boar Hair or USD 1713309 What's interesting? Just so you know, Anping is a company that has a history of 400 years in processing bristle and animal tail feathers. This company is the largest distribution center for animal tail feathers in the north of China. It is said that more than 50000 people are involved in the production process and have more than 1000 workshops spread all over the world. various countries The keyword that shows the identity of this white brush is the writing BRISTLE on the brush handle, which in the Webster Dictionary means PIG HAIR (boar bristle). or the other is done in a very easy and simple way Animal hair contains a protein called KERATIN Keratin is a group of proteins known as fiber proteins. Like protein, hair or fur that contains keratin when burned will cause a distinctive odor. it's the same when we kiss m smell of roasted meat Meanwhile, if the brush is made of palm fiber, fiber, or plastic, it will definitely not emit a specific aroma other than the smell of burning ash. The brush is unclean, so if it is used to spread bread, then the bread is unclean. In short, it is unlawful to eat unclean objects. NOTE: This unclean brush is also widely used to apply seasonings to grilled corn, pecel catfish, grilled fish, grilled chicken, barbeque, etc. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly HARAM, no matter how small, the material from pigs is forbidden to be consumed and to be applied. The illustrations in this article are examples of brushes and bristle brushes (the term is PIG or BOAR or HOG or BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, such as markets, painting supply stores, building materials stores, make-up shops and salons, online shops, etc. A Are you familiar with the various shapes below? There are painting brushes, wall paint brushes, makeup brushes, hair brushes, barber or barber brushes, clothes brushes, etc. BEWARE! TIPS AVOID THE USE OF BRUSHS AND BORN BRUSHS: Use 100% synthetic brushes and brushes, such as nylon. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, at slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for toothbrushes. Use other alternatives than brushes. Examples of paint rollers for painting, sponges and cotton buds for applying make-up, as well as knives and spatulas for greasing food. Beware of foods that use a pig brush to cook and clean their tools Sea urchin brushes are sold in white and black. However, manufacturers may process sea urchins by bleaching them and then dyeing them so that they look like other animal hairs.
berita_id: Dalam kehidupan sehari -hari, kami menggunakan berbagai jenis kuas untuk membuat, melukis, membersihkan debu, mengecat rumah, wajan kue minyak, untuk mengolesi makanan seperti massa panggang, roti, kue, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai, apakah Anda tahu kuas dan sikat apa yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari landak laut!Sikat disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada rambut hewan lainnya, seperti tupai, kambing, sipil, unta, dan anjing.Januari - Juni 2001 Periode, Indonesia mengimpor 282.983 ton bulu babi dan rambut babi atau babi atau USD 1713309 Apa yang menarik?Asal tahu saja, Anping adalah perusahaan yang memiliki sejarah 400 tahun dalam memproses bulu dan bulu ekor hewan.Perusahaan ini adalah pusat distribusi terbesar untuk bulu ekor hewan di utara Cina.Dikatakan bahwa lebih dari 50000 orang terlibat dalam proses produksi dan memiliki lebih dari 1000 lokakarya yang tersebar di seluruh dunia.Berbagai negara Kata kunci yang menunjukkan identitas sikat putih ini adalah bulu tulisan pada pegangan sikat, yang dalam kamus Webster berarti rambut babi (bulu babi).Atau yang lain dilakukan dengan cara yang sangat mudah dan sederhana rambut hewan mengandung protein yang disebut keratin keratin adalah sekelompok protein yang dikenal sebagai protein serat.Seperti protein, rambut atau bulu yang mengandung keratin ketika dibakar akan menyebabkan bau yang khas.Itu sama ketika kita mencium bau daging panggang sementara itu, jika sikat terbuat dari serat kelapa sawit, serat, atau plastik, itu pasti tidak akan memancarkan aroma tertentu selain bau abu yang terbakar.Sikatnya najis, jadi jika digunakan untuk menyebarkan roti, maka roti itu najis.Singkatnya, tidak sah untuk memakan benda najis.Catatan: Sikat najis ini juga banyak digunakan untuk mengoleskan bumbu pada jagung panggang, ikan lele pecel, ikan bakar, ayam panggang, barbeque, dll. Untuk umat Islam, penggunaan bulu babi jelas haram, tidak peduli seberapa kecil, bahan dari babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan diterapkan.Ilustrasi dalam artikel ini adalah contoh kuas dan sikat bulu (istilah ini adalah babi atau babi atau babi atau sikat rambut bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko pasokan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko make-up dan salon, toko online, dll. A Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah?Ada kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, sikat rias, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur atau tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll. Waspadalah!Kiat Hindari penggunaan kuas dan kuas yang lahir: Gunakan sikat dan kuas sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.Gunakan alternatif lain selain kuas.Contoh rol cat untuk lukisan, spons dan cotton buds untuk mengoleskan make-up, serta pisau dan spatula untuk makanan yang berminyak.Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang menggunakan sikat babi untuk memasak dan membersihkan alat -alat mereka sikat landak laut dijual putih dan hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkannya dan kemudian mewarnai mereka sehingga mereka terlihat seperti rambut hewan lainnya.

berita: Ahok is not dismissed as Governor of DKI Jakarta due to his status as a defendant in the case of blasphemy against Islam, shows how difficult the law in this country is to enforce. How can you seek brave out justice if the law is a tool to seek justice alone is difficult to enforce. Not a few legal and state administration experts, including former Constitutional Court Justice Mahfud MD, criticized the steps taken by the government, especially the Minister of Home Affairs Tjahyo Kumolo and President Joko Widodo who remained silent when Ahok returned to the governorship, while several other regional heads were dismissed when their status was accused of an act. criminal. This eventually led to the demands of law enforcement through the actions of defending Islam and Defending the State carried out by the Muslim community who joined the FUI (Islamic Community Forum) today (Tuesday, 21/02/2017). In addition to the masses from FUI, there were also a number of students who were members of the student movement for people's defense. Their demands include dismissing the governor who is a suspect, stopping the criminalization of ulama, stopping the arrest of student activists, restoring the nation's sovereignty and returning it to the original 1945 Constitution. The action, which was held in front of the DPR-MPR Building, turned out to be attracting people from outside Jakarta. They tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque to pray Fajr in congregation and also at that time the weather was raining. Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal mosque was tightly closed, even though it was approaching Fajr time. As a result, the Action congregation had to get rained on, some of them chose to lie down on the street while waiting for Fajr time. According to a report from one of the gabbarberita.com contributors in the field, the new mosque opened at around 04.00 WIB. Previously where were the BPPMI management and were appointed and inaugurated directly by the Minister of Religion who was also in the structure as the Chairman of BPPMI.
berita_id: Ahok tidak dipecat sebagai gubernur DKI Jakarta karena statusnya sebagai terdakwa dalam kasus penistaan ​​terhadap Islam, menunjukkan betapa sulitnya hukum di negara ini untuk menegakkan.Bagaimana Anda bisa mencari keadilan yang berani jika hukum adalah alat untuk mencari keadilan saja sulit untuk ditegakkan.Tidak sedikit pakar administrasi hukum dan negara bagian, termasuk mantan pengadilan konstitusional Mahfud MD, mengkritik langkah -langkah yang diambil oleh pemerintah, terutama Menteri Dalam Negeri Tjahyo Kumolo dan Presiden Joko Widodo yang tetap diam ketika Ahok kembali ke gubernur, sementara beberapa kepala regional lainnya diberhentikan ketika status mereka ditimbulkan oleh sebuah tindakan.pidana.Hal ini akhirnya mengarah pada tuntutan penegakan hukum melalui tindakan membela Islam dan mempertahankan negara yang dilakukan oleh komunitas Muslim yang bergabung dengan FUI (Forum Komunitas Islam) hari ini (Selasa, 21/02/2017).Selain massa dari Fui, ada juga sejumlah siswa yang merupakan anggota gerakan siswa untuk pertahanan rakyat.Tuntutan mereka termasuk memecat gubernur yang merupakan tersangka, menghentikan kriminalisasi ulama, menghentikan penangkapan aktivis mahasiswa, memulihkan kedaulatan negara dan mengembalikannya ke konstitusi asli 1945.Aksi, yang diadakan di depan gedung DPR-MPR, ternyata menarik orang dari luar Jakarta.Mereka mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal untuk berdoa Fajr di jemaat dan juga pada waktu itu cuaca sedang hujan.Rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal tertutup rapat, meskipun mendekati waktu fajr.Akibatnya, jemaat aksi harus dihujani, beberapa dari mereka memilih untuk berbaring di jalan sambil menunggu waktu Fajr.Menurut laporan dari salah satu kontributor Gabbarberita.com di lapangan, masjid baru dibuka pada sekitar pukul 04.00 WIB.Sebelumnya di mana manajemen BPPMI dan ditunjuk dan diresmikan secara langsung oleh Menteri Agama yang juga berada dalam struktur sebagai ketua BPPMI.

berita: The Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia assessed that the burning of reog carried out by the connexion Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao City, Philippines, could not be justified. The reason is there are other ways that can be taken to deal with the obsolete reog. "If he is old, can't he be put in a museum for learning, that should be the case," said Chairman of the Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia, Begug Purnomosidi when contacted by Republika.co.id, Monday (2/11). The Indonesian people should respect their own arts and culture. Neighboring countries, Begug said, want to make Reog Ponorogo as an art. "We who have Reog Ponorogo are even like that, this is not right," he said. The association will immediately find out what the real reason is and what responsibility the Ministry of Foreign Affairs has given regarding this incident. "We feel uncomfortable, which is clearly offended," he said. . Tomorrow, Begug and his colleagues will meet with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to clarify the problem. In addition, the Consulate General in Davao City must apologize to the Indonesian people, especially the Reog Ponorogo lovers for their actions. Begug himself learned of the arson incident from his friends and Youtube on Saturday (31/10). He hopes that Reog Ponorogo can be recognized internationally as Indonesia's cultural heritage so that it is not recognized by other countries. "We will fight so that Reog Ponorogo is recognized by Unesco as a nation's heritage, just like batik," he said.
berita_id: Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia menilai bahwa pembakaran reog yang dilakukan oleh Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Kota Davao, Filipina, tidak dapat dibenarkan.Alasannya adalah ada cara lain yang dapat diambil untuk menangani reog yang sudah usang."Jika dia sudah tua, tidak bisakah dia dimasukkan ke dalam museum untuk belajar, itu seharusnya terjadi," kata ketua Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia, Purnomosidi Begug ketika dihubungi oleh Republika.co.id, Senin (2/11).Orang -orang Indonesia harus menghormati seni dan budaya mereka sendiri.Negara -negara tetangga, kata Begug, ingin menjadikan Reog Ponorogo sebagai seni."Kami yang telah reog Ponorogo bahkan seperti itu, ini tidak benar," katanya.Asosiasi akan segera mencari tahu apa alasan sebenarnya dan tanggung jawab apa yang diberikan oleh Kementerian Luar Negeri mengenai insiden ini."Kami merasa tidak nyaman, yang jelas tersinggung," katanya..Besok, Begug dan rekan -rekannya akan bertemu dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri untuk mengklarifikasi masalahnya.Selain itu, Konsulat Jenderal di Kota Davao harus meminta maaf kepada rakyat Indonesia, terutama pecinta Ponorogo yang reog atas tindakan mereka.Begug sendiri mengetahui insiden pembakaran dari teman -temannya dan YouTube pada hari Sabtu (31/10).Dia berharap bahwa Reog Ponorogo dapat diakui secara internasional sebagai warisan budaya Indonesia sehingga tidak diakui oleh negara lain."Kami akan bertarung sehingga Reog Ponorogo diakui oleh UNESCO sebagai warisan bangsa, seperti Batik," katanya.

berita: The Ministry of Finance confirms that the news regarding a salary increase of President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) of up to IDR 553 million per month is invalid data and cannot be accounted for. Askolani's budget at the Ministry of Finance's office, Monday (12/3/2018) The presentation material which is currently apparatus being discussed on social media, said Askolani, cannot be accounted for at all because until now the government has not received any proposals related to this. The government's focus currently, he continued, is to finalize the draft government regulation (RPP) related to the provision of the 13th salary and holiday allowances for civil servants and retirees. That's the mandate of the APBN Law," he explained Government regulation (RPP) regarding the State Civil Apparatus which states that the President's salary has increased from the current position of Rp. 62 million to Rp. 553 million. PNS) circulating. In the explanation, one of them was stated regarding the simulation of the income of state officials from the president to the leadership of the DPR which consists of salaries and allowances It was stated that the simulated income of the president was Rp. the same explanation, simulation of the amount of income for ministerial-level officials, attorney general, TNI Commander, Chief of Police, Chairman of the MPR, Chairman of the DPR to Chairman of the Constitutional Court has an income of Rp. 92237116 per month. Simulation of calculating the income of officials from the level of deputy head of the MPR, DPR, DPD is also described. , KPK and MK which amounted to Rp. 88393902 million per month. Then the income of the governor and judges MA members amounting to Rp.76864263 million per month. In the presentation material, the title "RPP on Salaries, Benefits and Facilities for Civil Servants" with the logo of the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (PAN-RB) was written on it when confirmed, the Ministry of PAN-RB explained, that the exposure material was not official information. "It was only discussion material for 2016, not official information," explained the Head of the Legal, Communication and Public Information Bureau of the PAN-RB Ministry, Herman Suryatman when contacted by detikFinance

berita: The Muslim community was shocked by the news about toothbrushes made of boar bristles. One of the markers is the content of the toothbrush, bristle, which is listed on the packaging. The word bristle is then interpreted as a sea urchin. As a result, many Muslims are worried about using a toothbrush on the market. Quoted from the halalmui.org page, LPPOM MUI explains the term bristle means stiff hair or fiber. This definition refers to the Websters Dictionary, so all stiff hair, including stiff beards, palm fibers, pine leaves fall into the bristle category. In the industrial world, bristle is often used as a material for making brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle materials can come from animals such as pigs, horses, goats, considerably or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. To emphasize what bristles are used on a toothbrush, usually the term bristle will be written in the product name. For example, Boar Bristle Brush which means Pig Bristle Brush. Boar means wild boar or wild boar. If you find a toothbrush with the above sentence on the packaging, then the toothbrush is declared forbidden to use. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. Toothbrushes can also use boar bristles, wrote LPPOM MUI, quoted from halalmui.org, Wednesday, November 2, 2016. However, not all toothbrushes that contain the term bristle in their packaging must be made from pig bristles. There are already many manufacturers that use horse, goat, camel hair, as well as nylon and silicone fibers in their toothbrush products. When there is no information on the source of the material, at least a simple method can be used. To determine whether it is made from animal hair or not, the method in question is to burn the material. If it smells like burning hair or horns, better leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber do not emit such a distinctive odor when burned. wrote LPPOM MUI.
berita_id: Komunitas Muslim terkejut dengan berita tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Salah satu penanda adalah kandungan sikat gigi, Bristle, yang tercantum pada kemasannya.Kata bulu kemudian ditafsirkan sebagai landak laut.Akibatnya, banyak Muslim khawatir menggunakan sikat gigi di pasaran.Dikutip dari halaman halalmui.org, lppom mui menjelaskan istilah bulu berarti rambut atau serat yang kaku.Definisi ini mengacu pada kamus Websters, jadi semua rambut kaku, termasuk janggut kaku, serat kelapa sawit, daun pinus termasuk dalam kategori bulu.Di dunia industri, bulu sering digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat sikat dan sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.Bahan bulu dapat berasal dari hewan seperti babi, kuda, kambing, serat sintetis yang sangat atau sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Untuk menekankan bulu apa yang digunakan pada sikat gigi, biasanya istilah bulu akan ditulis dalam nama produk.Misalnya, sikat bulu babi yang berarti sikat bulu babi.Babi hutan berarti babi hutan atau babi hutan.Jika Anda menemukan sikat gigi dengan kalimat di atas pada kemasan, maka sikat gigi dinyatakan dilarang digunakan.Ini berarti bahwa produk adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar.Sikat gigi juga dapat menggunakan bulu babi, menulis lppom mui, dikutip dari halalmui.org, Rabu, 2 November 2016. Namun, tidak semua sikat gigi yang berisi istilah bulu dalam kemasannya harus dibuat dari bulu babi.Sudah ada banyak produsen yang menggunakan kuda, kambing, rambut unta, serta serat nilon dan silikon dalam produk sikat gigi mereka.Ketika tidak ada informasi tentang sumber materi, setidaknya metode sederhana dapat digunakan.Untuk menentukan apakah itu terbuat dari rambut hewani atau tidak, metode yang dimaksud adalah membakar material.Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik biarkan saja.Bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak memancarkan bau yang khas saat dibakar.menulis lppom mui.

berita: Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application in the past two days have been circulating on social media timelines. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall aggravated D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. Ananda's action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka, including netizens from Banten. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. One of the netizens from Cilegon City who currently lives in Qatar, Rahmat (40) said that he did not agree with the attitude of Ananda and Derianto, the founder of Traveloka, who took the WO action at the Kanisius event. "Their attitude is intolerant because they mix politics and education," said Rahmat. The same thing was expressed by Rina (39), a garment entrepreneur from Tangerang who also uploaded her Facebook timeline. "From now on bye-bye Traveloka, it's better to buy tickets at neighboring travel," said Rina
berita_id: Undangan untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka dalam dua hari terakhir telah beredar di jadwal media sosial.Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall memperburuk D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan Ananda diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lainnya.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka, termasuk netizen dari Banten.Tagar #Boikottraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.Salah satu netizen dari Cilegon City yang saat ini tinggal di Qatar, Rahmat (40) mengatakan bahwa ia tidak setuju dengan sikap Ananda dan DeRianto, pendiri Traveloka, yang mengambil tindakan WO di acara Kanisius."Sikap mereka tidak toleran karena mereka memadukan politik dan pendidikan," kata Rahmat.Hal yang sama diungkapkan oleh Rina (39), seorang pengusaha pakaian dari Tangerang yang juga mengunggah garis waktu Facebook -nya."Mulai sekarang di Bye-Bye Traveloka, lebih baik membeli tiket di tetangga perjalanan," kata Rina

berita: The Pokemon GO game fever that has recently occurred, has in fact been able to attract a lot of attention from various circles, including high-ranking officials in this country. Even recently the Mayor of Banda Aceh, Illiza Sa'aduddin Djamal, instructed not to play the Pokemon GO game because it means I'm Jewish. "And the pokemon have all been spread in electronic media, it turns out that it means that I am a Jew," said Illiza in a halal bi halal event with all officials and staff in the Banda convey Aceh City Government. Illiza Sa'aduddi Djamal's statement was not only conveyed in a halal bi halal event, he also tweeted on his Twitter account about the dangers of playing Pokemon GO which means I am Jewish. Suddenly, the tweet immediately got a lot of responses from Indonesian netizens who were famous for being critical. "@Illizaa Ma'am, I'm also a Muslim. Your statement is not true, and it's slander, Mom. Iqra, Mom. Read a lot. Mayor, you have to be wise," said the @risa_te account. "@Illizaa Pokemon means it's Pocket Monster, isn't it. Japanese people say 'Poketo Monsuta' that's why there's no c in the 'poke'. Is this the mayor? @jsoekahar chirped. Banda Aceh Mayor Illiza Sa'aduddi is not the first person to raise the strange bin magic theory about the meaning of the Pokemon. Previously, there were many broadcast messages and Facebook links floating around the issue that I was a Jew from Pokemon. It was explained that Pokemon comes from Syriac or Syriac which means I am Jewish and Pikachu is be Jewish then Charmander means God is weak. What is Syriac, and does Pokemon really mean I'm Jewish? Although it is also known as the Syrian language, Syriac is not the official language of the country (Syria's official language is Arabic). Syriac is spoken mostly by the minority Syrian Christians living in eastern Turkey, northern Iraq and northeastern Syria. The first news about the meaning of the word Pokemon from Syriac or Syriac emerged when the LA Times reported rumors of Arab countries' concerns about the invasion of Pokemon and other foreign cultures on April 24, 2001. "It has been proven that this toy is part of a Jewish plan to corrupt the minds of generations. our youth for offending blasphemous thoughts, making fun of Allah and our moral values ​​so it is very dangerous for our young generation," said Sheik Abdel Monem abu Zent, ​​a former member of the Jordanian parliament. The statement immediately received a rebuttal from the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church through the Jordanian Amman newspaper. It says that there is no connection between Syriac and the names of the characters in the Pokemon game, let alone to the point that it means I'm Jewish or be Jewish. As mentioned on the official website, Pokemon stands for Pocket Monster. Likewise with Pikachu which consists of two words, Pika and Chu, where Pika is the name for a small mouse and chu in Japanese means squeak. No wonder the most famous monster in Pokemon is in the form of a mouse. Or Charmander derived from Char (burning) and Salamander (amphibians such as lizards). It can be seen that the creators of this Pokemon only provide simple and easy to remember character names without the need to tire of learning Syriac or Syriac.
berita_id: Pokemon Go Game Fever yang baru-baru ini terjadi, sebenarnya mampu menarik banyak perhatian dari berbagai lingkaran, termasuk pejabat tinggi di negara ini.Bahkan baru -baru ini walikota Banda Aceh, Illiza Sa'aduddin Djamal, diperintahkan untuk tidak memainkan game Pokemon Go karena itu berarti saya Yahudi."Dan semua Pokemon telah tersebar di media elektronik, ternyata itu berarti bahwa saya seorang Yahudi," kata Illiza dalam acara halal halal halal dengan semua pejabat dan staf di Banda menyampaikan pemerintah Kota Aceh.Pernyataan Illiza Sa'aduddi Djamal tidak hanya disampaikan dalam acara halal halal halal, ia juga tweet di akun Twitter -nya tentang bahaya bermain Pokemon Go yang berarti saya orang Yahudi.Tiba -tiba, tweet itu segera mendapat banyak tanggapan dari netizen Indonesia yang terkenal karena kritis."@Illizaa Mu'am, saya juga seorang Muslim. Pernyataan Anda tidak benar, dan itu fitnah, Bu. Iqra, Bu. Baca banyak. Walikota, Anda harus bijaksana," kata akun @risa_te."@Illizaa pokemon berarti monster saku, bukan. Orang Jepang mengatakan 'poketo monsuta' itu sebabnya tidak ada c di 'poke'. Apakah ini walikota? @Jsoekahar mengunyah.Masalah bahwa saya adalah seorang Yahudi dari Pokemon.Orang -orang Kristen yang tinggal di Turki Timur, Irak Utara dan Suriah timur laut.Pemuda kita karena menyinggung pikiran penghujatan, mengolok -olok Allah dan nilai -nilai moral kita sehingga sangat berbahaya bagi generasi muda kita, "kata Sheik Abdel Monem Abu Zent, ​​mantan anggota Parlemen Yordania. Pernyataan itu segera menerima sanggahan dari Suric di antara Suric Charaes melalui surat kabar Surial melalui surat kabar Yordania Amman. Ia mengatakan bahwa itu adalah bahwa tidak ada permainan di Suric, Suric, melalui surat kabar Yordania Amman. Ia mengatakan bahwa itu ada di sana, tidak ada permainan di Suriak, Suriah, Koran Amman. Dikatakan bahwa ada di Suric di Syria.Poin yang berarti saya orang Yahudi atau menjadi orang Yahudi.kadal).

berita: Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara said that he would not block (close) Facebook permanently, but only temporarily. That is if the situation gets worse. This was conveyed by Rudiantara in response to Warganet who until now are still confused about the unclear information regarding the fate of Facebook in Indonesia. They also wonder whether Facebook will be closed in Indonesia or not. "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, then we will temporarily close (block it)," said Minister of Communication and Information Rudiantara as quoted from Liputan6.com Friday, April 20 2018. Rudiantara was reluctant to talk about closing Facebook's operations permanently. He is more focused on monitoring Facebook to create data security and prevent the spread of hate speech. Meanwhile, the House of Representatives also had asked the Communications and Information Technology to be more strict with Facebook. "We and the government - the Ministry of Communication and Informatics - will talk again regarding the follow-up to Facebook's mistake. Personally, I am still open to sanctions, I do not rule out also suggesting a Facebook service moratorium," said Meutya Hafid, Member of the Commission. I DPR RI. Meutya estimates that the DPR RI put upon will wait for the results of Facebook's internal investigation for the next month. "We are waiting, I think a month should be enough time. We hope that the results of this investigation will not only blame who, but also there should be information, where this misused data went and what it was used for," he said. The controversy arose from the Cambridge Analytica scandal, which accused Facebook of leaking data. After being investigated, it turns out that "leaking" is not the right term. The data was not leaked, but rather misused by Cambridge Analytica, allegedly for political purposes.
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa ia tidak akan memblokir (menutup) Facebook secara permanen, tetapi hanya sementara.Itu jika situasinya semakin buruk.Ini disampaikan oleh Rudiantara dalam menanggapi Warganet yang sampai sekarang masih bingung tentang informasi yang tidak jelas mengenai nasib Facebook di Indonesia.Mereka juga bertanya -tanya apakah Facebook akan ditutup di Indonesia atau tidak."Kita akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika menjadi lebih buruk, maka kita akan untuk sementara waktu akan menutup (memblokirnya)," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Rudiantara seperti yang dikutip dari LIPUTAN6.com Jumat, 20 April 2018. Rudiiantara enggan berbicara tentang menutup operasi Facebook secara permanen.Dia lebih fokus pada pemantauan Facebook untuk menciptakan keamanan data dan mencegah penyebaran pidato kebencian.Sementara itu, Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat juga telah meminta komunikasi dan teknologi informasi untuk lebih ketat dengan Facebook."Kami dan pemerintah - Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika - akan berbicara lagi mengenai tindak lanjut dari kesalahan Facebook. Secara pribadi, saya masih terbuka untuk sanksi, saya tidak mengesampingkan juga menyarankan moratorium layanan Facebook," kata Meutya Hafid, anggota komisi.I DPR RI.Meutya memperkirakan bahwa DPR RI akan menunggu hasil penyelidikan internal Facebook untuk bulan berikutnya."Kami sedang menunggu, saya pikir sebulan harus cukup waktu. Kami berharap hasil penyelidikan ini tidak hanya akan menyalahkan siapa, tetapi juga harus ada informasi, di mana data yang disalahgunakan ini pergi dan untuk apa itu digunakan," katanya.Kontroversi muncul dari skandal Cambridge Analytica, yang menuduh Facebook bocor data.Setelah diselidiki, ternyata "bocor" bukanlah istilah yang tepat.Data itu tidak bocor, melainkan disalahgunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica, yang diduga untuk tujuan politik.

berita: The Presidential Palace stated that the salaries of the President and Vice President did not increase. The statement was issued because there were rumors that President Joko Widodo was getting a salary increase. "There are reports that President Joko Widodo received a salary increase is not true," said the official statement received by Katadata, Wednesday (28/6). According to the Palace, until now, the President and Vice President still receive salaries in accordance with Law Number 7 of 1978 concerning the Financial/Administrative Rights of the President and Vice President as well as wage the Former Presidents and Vice Presidents. In Article 2 of the Law, it is stated that the basic salary of the President is six times the base salary of the highest official in Indonesia other than the President and Vice President. On the other hand, the base salary of the Vice President is four times the base salary of the highest official other than the President and Vice President. Meanwhile, according to Government Regulation no. 75 of 2000, the highest basic salary for state officials, namely the Chairman of the House of Representatives (DPR), the Supreme Court (MA), and the Supreme Audit Agency (BPK) is Rp 5.04 million per month. That way, the president's basic salary is six times or Rp 30.24 million per month. Meanwhile, the base salary of the Vice President is four times, which is Rp. 20.16 million per month. Meanwhile, the amount of office allowance received by the President is Rp. 32.5 million and the Vice President is Rp. 22 million per month. The provisions regarding this allowance are in accordance with Presidential Decree Number 68 of 2001. "Thus, the amount of income received by the President and Vice President has not changed since 2001," it was written. (Also read: Ministry of Finance Proposes Tax Employee Performance Allowance According to Workload) With this calculation, Jokowi's income from salary and office allowances is IDR 62.74 million per month. Meanwhile, Jusuf Kalla's income was IDR 42.16 million.
berita_id: Istana Presiden menyatakan bahwa gaji presiden dan wakil presiden tidak meningkat.Pernyataan itu dikeluarkan karena ada desas -desus bahwa Presiden Joko Widodo mendapatkan kenaikan gaji."Ada laporan bahwa Presiden Joko Widodo menerima kenaikan gaji tidak benar," kata pernyataan resmi yang diterima oleh Katadata, Rabu (28/6).Menurut Istana, sampai sekarang, presiden dan wakil presiden masih menerima gaji sesuai dengan hukum nomor 7 tahun 1978 mengenai hak keuangan/administrasi presiden dan wakil presiden serta upah mantan presiden dan wakil presiden.Dalam Pasal 2 Hukum, dinyatakan bahwa gaji dasar Presiden adalah enam kali gaji pokok pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia selain Presiden dan Wakil Presiden.Di sisi lain, gaji pokok wakil presiden empat kali lipat gaji pokok pejabat tertinggi selain presiden dan wakil presiden.Sementara itu, menurut peraturan pemerintah no.75 tahun 2000, gaji dasar tertinggi untuk pejabat negara, yaitu Ketua Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat (DPR), Mahkamah Agung (MA), dan Badan Audit Tertinggi (BPK) adalah RP 5,04 juta per bulan.Dengan begitu, gaji pokok presiden adalah enam kali atau Rp 30,24 juta per bulan.Sementara itu, gaji pokok Wakil Presiden adalah empat kali, yaitu RP.20,16 juta per bulan.Sementara itu, jumlah tunjangan kantor yang diterima oleh Presiden adalah RP.32,5 juta dan wakil presiden adalah RP.22 juta per bulan.Ketentuan tentang tunjangan ini sesuai dengan Keputusan Presiden Nomor 68 tahun 2001. "Dengan demikian, jumlah pendapatan yang diterima oleh Presiden dan Wakil Presiden tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001," itu ditulis.(Juga baca: Kementerian Keuangan mengusulkan tunjangan kinerja karyawan pajak sesuai dengan beban kerja) dengan perhitungan ini, pendapatan Jokowi dari gaji dan tunjangan kantor adalah IDR 62,74 juta per bulan.Sementara itu, pendapatan Jusuf Kalla adalah IDR 42,16 juta.

berita: The night of the 90th anniversary of Kanisius College at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran North Jakarta Saturday 11112017 has been a hot topic of conversation for the last few days It is not about the existence of the Kanisius College educational institution which has succeeded in producing many outstanding children of the nation and occupying several important positions in this country but what is being discussed is the walk out action WO carried out by the pianist who is also an alumni of Kanisius College Ananda Sukarlan This became a topic of discussion because Ananda chose WO when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the event Moreover Ananda who is one of the five recipients of the award given by Kanisius College in his speech criticized the event committee for deliberately inviting figures who contradict the values taught by Canisius Although he did not mention names but with the speech delivered after the WO action it was judged by many parties that the figure in question was Anies and related to the campaign situation in the 2017 DKI Pilkada There were pros and cons to his attitude Quoted from Metrotvnewscom Wednesday 11152017 Ananda confirmed that his WO action was a personal decision and did not represent any party In addition he also denied various oblique issues that circulated by calling himself impolite Some people say I was screaming in my chair thats not true It happened I sat in the VIP seat which was at the front bench number two from the front while the exit door was at the back he said So if I stand up I can see it I stand up and walk out politely because I dont want to disturb people who want to listen to Mr Anies speech The situation is that I stand up and go back like someone wants to go to the toilet continued Ananda Regarding the allegation that he instigated several invitations to WO Ananda also denied After that there were some who came out but not because of my explain provocation Its not a gang action were not all out My seat is separated from my friends because I sit VIP to receive the award I dont conspire with my friends It was a spontaneous event It was really my initiative not from anyone said Ananda For the various rumors circulating Ananda regretted the netizens who did not properly digest the information Even the issue spread to other issues around religion and politics There is a website that writes that I am a Christian Please if you want to slander research first Canisius is Catholic Not Christian I myself am Muslim If you want to slander me it is better to slander me as a Catholic said Ananda Please also explain that this has nothing to do with College Canisius My speech actually criticized College Kanisius My speech did not criticize Anies Baswedan My speech criticized the event committee My speech was also not
